00133 /* dataflow interface function which performs crude analysis on
00134  * predicate registers to enable correct scheduling of branch combinined code
00135  */
00136 
00137 /******************************************************************************\
00138  *
00139  * Special routines to determine the number of loads, stores and branches per
00140  * cycle from the current mdes.
00141  *
00142 \******************************************************************************/
00143 
00144 int Lsched_loads_per_cycle()
00145 {
00146     if (Lsched_loads_each_cycle)
00147         return Lsched_loads_each_cycle;
00148     else
00149     return mdes_total_slots();
00150 }
00151 
00152 int Lsched_stores_per_cycle()
00153 {
00154     if (Lsched_stores_each_cycle)
00155         return Lsched_stores_each_cycle;
00156     else
00157     return mdes_total_slots();
00158 }
00159 
00160 int Lsched_branches_per_cycle()
00161 {
00162     if (Lsched_num_branches_per_cycle>0)
00163         return Lsched_num_branches_per_cycle;
00164     else
00165         return mdes_total_slots();
00166 }
00167 
00168 int Lsched_issue_time(L_Oper *oper)
00169 {
00170     if (!L_do_prepass_sched || oper->ext==NULL)
00171         return -1;
00172     else
00173         return SCHED_INFO(oper)->issue_time;
00174 }
00175 
00176 int Lsched_completion_time(L_Oper *oper)
00177 /* added to replace sinfo->completion_time which has been deleted. BLD 6/95 */
00178 {
00179     if (!L_do_prepass_sched || oper->ext==NULL)
00180         return -1;
00181     else
00182         return (SCHED_INFO(oper)->issue_time + Lsched_latency(oper));
00183 }
00184 
00185 int Lsched_latency(L_Oper *oper)
00186 /* returns the max latency over all the dest operands.  BLD 6/95 */
00187 {
00188     int i, latency;
00189     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
00190 
00191     if (!L_do_prepass_sched || oper->ext==NULL)
00192         latency = -1;
00193     else
00194     {
00195         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00196         latency = 0;
00197         for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00198             if (oper->dest[i] != NULL) {
00199                 if (sinfo->relative_latency[i] > latency)
00200                     latency = sinfo->relative_latency[i];
00201             }
00202     }
00203 
00204     return latency;
00205 }

00292 
00293 void Lsched_init(command_line_macro_list, lmdes_file_name)
00294 Parm_Macro_List *command_line_macro_list;
00295 char *lmdes_file_name;
00296 {
00297     /* Perform mdes initialization (may be .lmdes or .lmdes2 file
00298      * for list scheduling) -JCG 4/7/98
00299      */
00300     L_init_lmdes2(lmdes_file_name, L_max_pred_operand, L_max_dest_operand,
00301                   L_max_src_operand, 4 /* Support up to 4 sync operands */);
00302 
00303     /* Perform dependence initialization */
00304     Ldep_init(command_line_macro_list);
00305 
00306     /* Initialize parameters used for scheduling */
00307     Lsched_processor_model = mdes_processor_model();
00308     Lsched_total_issue_slots = mdes_total_slots();
00309 
00310     /* Load the parameters specific to Lcode code generation */
00311     /* Renamed 'Scheduler' to 'Lschedule' -JCG 5/26/98 */
00312     L_load_parameters_aliased (L_parm_file, command_line_macro_list,
00313                        "(Lschedule", "(Scheduler", L_read_parm_lsched);
00314 
00315     /* Support computation of static priorities */
00316     Lsched_branch_increase = floor (1.0 / Lsched_branches_per_cycle());
00317  
00318     /* Initialize the integer equivalent to the scheduling model */
00319     if (L_spec_model == BASIC_BLOCK)
00320     {
00321         Ldep_allow_upward_code_perc = 0;
00322         Ldep_allow_downward_code_perc = 0;
00323     }
00324     else if ((L_spec_model == RESTRICTED) || (L_spec_model == GENERAL) ||
00325              (L_spec_model == MCB))
00326     {
00327         Lsched_include_only_oper_lt_hb = 0;
00328     }
00329 
00330     else if (L_spec_model == WRITEBACK_SUPPRESSION)
00331     {
00332         Lsched_include_only_oper_lt_hb = 1;
00333     }
00334 #if 0
00335     else if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB)) 
00336     {
00337         Lsched_include_only_oper_lt_hb = 0;
00338         Lsched_demote_all_the_way = Lsched_do_sentinel_recovery;
00339         L_sentinel_init();
00340     }
00341 #endif
00342 
00343     /* Create memory pools for allocation of data structures */
00344     Sched_Info_pool = 
00345         L_create_alloc_pool ("Sched_Info", sizeof(Sched_Info), 100);
00346     Operand_ready_pool =
00347         L_create_alloc_pool ("operand_ready_times", 
00348             mdes_latency_count()*sizeof(int), 100);
00349 
00350     /* initialize MCB memory pool */
00351     if (L_spec_model == MCB)
00352         L_mcb_init();
00353 
00354     /* Perform resource manager initialization */
00355     RU_set_max_pred(1 /* was L_max_pred_operand */);    /* hard code for 1 now */
00356     RU_map_create(0);
00357 
00358     /* Create queue pools */
00359     Squeue_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Squeue", sizeof (Squeue), 16);
00360     Sq_entry_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Sq_entry", sizeof(Sq_entry), 128);
00361 
00362     /* Create scheduling queues */
00363     scheduled_queue = L_create_queue ("scheduled_queue", 0);
00364     priority_ready_queue = L_create_queue ("priority_ready_queue", 0);
00365     regpres_ready_queue = L_create_queue ("regpres_ready_queue", 0);
00366     pending_ready_queue = L_create_queue ("pending_ready_queue", 0);
00367     not_ready_queue = L_create_queue ("not_ready_queue", 0);
00368 
00369 }
00370 
00371 
00372 /* Renumbers issue slots to be the lowest slot number while maintaining
00373  * scheduled order.  Totally ignores MDES specification.  Used to
00374  * format slots for vliw code  (slot number doesn't mater).
00375  *
00376  * Written by JCG 5/8/95 to facilitate using anaysis tools with my
00377  * vliw mdes (which put branches in slots 30-59).
00378  */
00379 void Lsched_renumber_issue_slots (L_Func *fn)
00380 {
00381     L_Cb *cb;
00382     L_Oper *op;
00383     L_Attr *isl;
00384     int desired_slot, cur_cycle, sched_cycle;
00385 
00386     /* Scan all cb's in function */
00387     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
00388     {
00389         /* Reset slot/cycle for each cb */
00390         cur_cycle = -1;
00391         desired_slot = 0;
00392 
00393         /* Scan all ops in function */
00394         for (op = cb->first_op; op != NULL; op = op->next_op)
00395         {
00396             /* Get isl attribute (if available) */
00397             isl = L_find_attr (op->attr, "isl");
00398 
00399             /* If not found, goto next op */
00400             if (isl == NULL)
00401                 continue;
00402 
00403             /* If does not have  slot/cycle specifies, goto next op */
00404             if ((isl->max_field < 1) || (isl->field[0] == NULL) || 
00405                 (isl->field[1] == NULL))
00406                 continue;
00407 
00408             /* Get scheduled slot/cycle */
00409             sched_cycle = isl->field[0]->value.i;
00410             
00411             /* If we change cycles, reset desired_slot */
00412             if (cur_cycle != sched_cycle)
00413             {
00414                 cur_cycle = sched_cycle;
00415                 desired_slot = 0;
00416             }
00417 
00418             /* Set slot is isl to the desired leftmost slot */
00419             isl->field[1]->value.i = desired_slot;
00420 
00421             /* Increment desired_slot for next instruction */
00422             desired_slot++;
00423         }
00424     }
00425 }
00426 
00427 void Lsched_func_complete(fn)
00428 L_Func *fn;
00429 {
00430     L_Cb        *cb;
00431     L_Oper      *oper;
00432     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
00433     Mdes_Info   *mdes_info;
00434     L_Attr      *new_attr;
00435     int         last_issue_time;
00436 
00437     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb!=NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
00438     {
00439         /* Used for delimiting cycles -JCG */
00440         last_issue_time = 0;
00441 
00442         /*
00443          * Free memory associated with scheduler memory pools
00444          */
00445         for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
00446         {
00447             if (oper->ext!=NULL)
00448             {
00449                 sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00450                 mdes_info = sinfo->mdes_info;
00451 
00452                 if (Lsched_print_cycle_delimiter)
00453                 {
00454                     /* Print newline before each cycle's ops -JCG 10/6/95*/
00455                     if (sinfo->issue_time != last_issue_time)
00456                     {
00457                         oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags,
00458                                                  L_OPER_PRINT_CYCLE_DELIMITER);
00459                         
00460                         last_issue_time = sinfo->issue_time;
00461                     }
00462                     else
00463                     {
00464                         oper->flags = L_CLR_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags,
00465                                                  L_OPER_PRINT_CYCLE_DELIMITER);
00466                         
00467                     }
00468                 }
00469 
00470                 if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(oper->flags, L_OPER_SPECULATIVE))
00471                 {
00472                     switch (sinfo->spec_cond)
00473                     {
00474                         case DEP_NON_EXCEPTING:
00475                             oper->flags = L_CLR_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, L_OPER_SAFE_PEI);
00476                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00477                             {
00478                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("NON_EXCEPTING_SAFE", 0);
00479                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00480                                     new_attr);
00481                             }
00482                             break;
00483 
00484                         case DEP_ALWAYS_SAFE:
00485                             oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, 
00486                                 L_OPER_SAFE_PEI);
00487 
00488                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00489                             {
00490                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("ALWAYS_SAFE", 0);
00491                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00492                                     new_attr);
00493                             }
00494                             break;
00495 
00496                         case DEP_CTL_DEP_SAFE:
00497                             oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, 
00498                                 L_OPER_SAFE_PEI);
00499 
00500                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00501                             {
00502                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("CTL_DEP_SAFE", 0);
00503                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00504                                     new_attr);
00505                             }
00506                             break;
00507 
00508                         case DEP_COMPLEX_SAFE:
00509                             oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, 
00510                                 L_OPER_SAFE_PEI);
00511 
00512                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00513                             {
00514                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("COMPLEX_SAFE", 0);
00515                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00516                                     new_attr);
00517                             }
00518                             break;
00519 
00520                         case DEP_SILENT:
00521                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00522                             {
00523                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("SILENT", 0);
00524                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00525                                     new_attr);
00526                             }
00527                             break;
00528 
00529                         case DEP_DELAYS_EXCEPTION:
00530                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00531                             {
00532                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("DELAYS_EXCEPTION", 0);
00533                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00534                                     new_attr);
00535                             }
00536                             break;
00537 
00538                         case DEP_SAFE_STORE:
00539                             if (Lsched_print_spec_condition)
00540                             {
00541                                 new_attr = L_new_attr("SAFE_STORE", 0);
00542                                 oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr,
00543                                     new_attr);
00544                             }
00545                             break;
00546 
00547                         default:
00548                             L_punt("Invalid speculation condition\n");
00549 
00550                     }
00551                 }
00552 #if 1
00553                 else
00554                     /* We don't need this information for non-speculated instructions */
00555                     oper->flags = L_CLR_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, 
00556                         L_OPER_SAFE_PEI);
00557 #endif
00558 
00559                 /* delete Sched_info struture */
00560                 L_delete_sched_info(sinfo);
00561             }
00562         }
00563     }
00564 
00565     /* If set in parm file, renumber issue slots to that the leftmost
00566      * slots are used. 
00567      */
00568     if (Lsched_do_renumber_issue_slots)
00569     {
00570         Lsched_renumber_issue_slots (fn);
00571     }
00572 
00573     /* REH 6-95, only mark if function was actually scheduled */
00574     if ( L_do_prepass_sched || Lsched_do_postpass_scheduling )
00575         /* SAM 5-95, mark function as scheduled for correct emulation */
00576         fn->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(fn->flags, L_FUNC_SCHEDULED);
00577 }
00578 
00579 /******************************************************************************\
00580  *
00581  * Allocation routines for Sched_Info structure
00582  *
00583 \******************************************************************************/
00584  
00585 Sched_Info* L_create_sched_info (L_Oper *oper, int home_block, L_Oper *prev_br, 
00586                                  L_Oper *post_br)
00587 {
00588     int         i, max_ready;
00589     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
00590 
00591     sinfo = (Sched_Info *) L_alloc(Sched_Info_pool);
00592 
00593     sinfo->sort_key1 = 0.0;
00594     sinfo->sort_key1 = 0.0;
00595     sinfo->rsort_key1 = 0.0;
00596     sinfo->rsort_key2 = 0.0;
00597 
00598     sinfo->oper = oper;
00599     sinfo->id = oper->id;
00600     sinfo->proc_opc = oper->proc_opc;
00601     sinfo->ru_info = L_create_ru_info_oper(oper);
00602     sinfo->dep_info = (Dep_Info *)oper->dep_info;
00603     sinfo->mdes_info = (Mdes_Info *)oper->mdes_info;
00604     sinfo->entry_list = NULL;
00605 
00606     if (sinfo->dep_info)
00607     {
00608         sinfo->spec_cond = sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond;
00609         sinfo->num_depend = sinfo->dep_info->n_input_dep;
00610     }
00611 
00612     sinfo->operand_ready_times = (int *) L_alloc(Operand_ready_pool);
00613     for (i=0, max_ready=mdes_latency_count(); i<max_ready; i++)
00614         sinfo->operand_ready_times[i] = -100; /* Changed from 0 -JCG 2/22/96 */
00615     
00616     sinfo->benefit = 0.0;
00617     sinfo->kill_set.p = 0.0;
00618     sinfo->kill_set.i = 0.0;
00619     sinfo->kill_set.f = 0.0;
00620     sinfo->kill_set.d = 0.0;
00621     sinfo->def_set.p = 0.0;
00622     sinfo->def_set.i = 0.0;
00623     sinfo->def_set.f = 0.0;
00624     sinfo->def_set.d = 0.0;
00625     sinfo->branch_kill_set_size = 0;
00626     sinfo->branch_kill_set = NULL;
00627 
00628     sinfo->priority = 0.0;
00629     sinfo->weight = oper->weight;
00630     sinfo->instr_prob = 0.0;
00631     sinfo->taken_instr_prob = 0.0;
00632     sinfo->not_taken_instr_prob = 0.0;
00633     sinfo->index = 0;
00634     sinfo->on_stack = 0;
00635 
00636     sinfo->etime = -1000;
00637     sinfo->ltimes = NULL;
00638 
00639     sinfo->scheduled = 0;
00640     sinfo->issue_time = 0;
00641     sinfo->issue_slot = -1;
00642     sinfo->relative_latency = (int *) Lcode_malloc (L_max_dest_operand * sizeof(int));
00643     for (i=0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++) /* init to -1.  BLD 6/95 */
00644         sinfo->relative_latency[i] = -1;
00645     sinfo->ready_time = 0;
00646     sinfo->earliest_slot = 0;
00647 
00648     sinfo->delay_sinfo = NULL;
00649 
00650     sinfo->home_block = home_block;
00651     sinfo->current_block = home_block;
00652     sinfo->orig_block = home_block;
00653     sinfo->prev_br = prev_br;
00654     sinfo->post_br = post_br;
00655 
00656     sinfo->extend_lr_down = NULL;
00657 
00658     sinfo->check_op = NULL;
00659     sinfo->store_list = NULL;
00660 
00661     return sinfo;
00662 }
00663 
00664 void L_update_sched_info (Sched_Info *sinfo, L_Oper *oper, int home_block)
00665 {
00666     int i, max_ready;
00667 
00668     sinfo->dep_info = (Dep_Info *)oper->dep_info;
00669     sinfo->mdes_info = (Mdes_Info *)oper->mdes_info;
00670     sinfo->entry_list = NULL;
00671 
00672     if (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond != DEP_NON_EXCEPTING)
00673         sinfo->spec_cond = sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond;
00674     sinfo->num_depend = sinfo->dep_info->n_input_dep;
00675 
00676     for (i=0, max_ready=mdes_latency_count(); i<max_ready; i++)
00677         sinfo->operand_ready_times[i] = 0;
00678 
00679     sinfo->on_stack = 0;
00680 
00681     sinfo->scheduled = 0;
00682     sinfo->issue_time = 0;
00683     sinfo->issue_slot = -1;
00684     for (i=0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++) /* init to -1.  BLD 6/95 */
00685         sinfo->relative_latency[i] = -1;
00686     sinfo->ready_time = 0;
00687     sinfo->earliest_slot = 0;
00688 
00689     sinfo->delay_sinfo = NULL;
00690 
00691     sinfo->current_block = home_block;
00692     sinfo->orig_block = home_block;
00693 
00694     sinfo->extend_lr_down = NULL;
00695     sinfo->check_op = NULL;
00696 }
00697 
00698 void L_delete_sched_info(Sched_Info *sinfo)
00699 {
00700     L_Oper *oper = sinfo->oper;
00701 
00702     if (sinfo->branch_kill_set) free(sinfo->branch_kill_set);
00703     if (sinfo->ltimes) free(sinfo->ltimes);
00704     Lcode_free (sinfo->relative_latency);
00705     L_delete_ru_info_oper(sinfo->ru_info);
00706     L_free(Operand_ready_pool, sinfo->operand_ready_times);
00707     L_free(Sched_Info_pool, sinfo);
00708 
00709     oper->ext = NULL;
00710 }
00711 
00712 #if 1
00713 void L_print_sched_info(F, s_info)
00714 FILE *F;
00715 Sched_Info *s_info;
00716 {
00717 
00718         if (!s_info) return;
00719 
00720         fprintf(F, "OP %d\n", s_info->id);
00721         fprintf(F, "\thome_block\t%d\n", s_info->home_block);
00722         fprintf(F, "\tcurrent_block\t%d\n", s_info->current_block);
00723         if (s_info->prev_br)
00724             fprintf(F, "\tprev_br\t%d\n", s_info->prev_br->id);
00725         else
00726             fprintf(F, "\tprev_br\tNULL\n");
00727         if (s_info->post_br)
00728             fprintf(F, "\tpost_br\t%d\n", s_info->post_br->id);
00729         else
00730             fprintf(F, "\tpost_br\tNULL\n");
00731 }

00733 
00734 
00735 /******************************************************************************\
00736  *
00737  * Routines to compute early times and (re)compute late times.
00738  * Priority values are also calculated here too.
00739  * These routines were added to handle some of the shortcomings of static
00740  *   scheduling heuristics.
00741  (
00742 \******************************************************************************/
00743 
00744 void Lsched_init_etimes_and_ltimes (L_Cb *cb)
00745 /* initializes the etimes and ltimes so everything will work correctly.
00746  * postpass scheduling does not create new sinfo structures if they are already
00747  * present for prepass scheduling.  SO BE WARNED!!!!! */
00748 {
00749     L_Oper      *oper;
00750     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
00751 
00752     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op) {
00753         if (!oper->ext) /* oper does not get scheduled, so don't consider it */
00754             continue;
00755         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00756         sinfo->etime = -1000;
00757         if (sinfo->ltimes)
00758             free (sinfo->ltimes);
00759         sinfo->ltimes = NULL;
00760     }
00761 }
00762 
00763 int Lsched_determine_etimes(L_Cb *cb, L_Oper ***exit_ops)
00764 /* returns the number of exits present in this cb.  also fills in the *oper
00765  * fields of exit_ops and initializes the ltimes. */
00766 {
00767     L_Oper      *oper, *dep_oper;
00768     int         num_exits = 0, exit_num = 0, temp_etime, i;
00769     L_Dep       *dep;
00770     Sched_Info  *sinfo, *dsinfo;
00771 
00772     /* compute early times for each operation.  also collect info on
00773      * number of exits found in this cb. */
00774     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op) {
00775         if (!oper->ext) /* oper does not get scheduled, so don't consider it. */
00776             continue;
00777         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00778         if (IS_UCOND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc) || IS_COND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc))
00779             num_exits++;
00780         for (dep = DEP_INFO(oper)->input_dep; dep; dep = dep->next_dep) {
00781             if (dep->omega == 0) {
00782                 dep_oper = dep->from_oper;
00783                 dsinfo = SCHED_INFO(dep_oper);
00784                 if (dsinfo->etime < 0) /* value should be init'ed */
00785                     L_punt ("ERROR: uninitialized etime found during etime \
00786 calculation.\n");
00787                 temp_etime = dsinfo->etime + dep->distance;
00788                 /* We only increase the etime for control dependence path */
00789 
00790                 if ((dep->type == L_DEP_CNT) &&
00791                     ((L_general_branch_opcode(dep_oper) ||
00792                       L_general_subroutine_call_opcode(dep_oper)) &&
00793                      (L_general_branch_opcode(oper) ||
00794                       L_general_subroutine_call_opcode(oper))))
00795                     if (dep->distance == 0)
00796                         temp_etime += Lsched_branch_increase;
00797 
00798                 if (temp_etime > sinfo->etime)
00799                     sinfo->etime = temp_etime;
00800             }
00801         }
00802         if (sinfo->etime == -1000)
00803             sinfo->etime = 0;
00804     }
00805 
00806     /* if last instruction in cb is not an unconditional branch, another exit
00807      * is needed. (another exit is also needed if the last instruction is
00808      * predicated) */
00809     if (!IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc) || 
00810         (L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) && !L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
00811                                                 L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))
00812         num_exits++;
00813 
00814     /* set values for exit_ops and malloc for ltimes. */
00815     *exit_ops = (L_Oper **) malloc (sizeof (L_Oper*) * num_exits);
00816     exit_num = 0;
00817     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op) {
00818         if (!oper->ext) /* oper does not get scheduled, so don't consider it. */
00819             continue;
00820         if (IS_UCOND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc) || IS_COND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc)) {
00821             (*exit_ops)[exit_num] = oper;
00822             exit_num++;
00823         }
00824         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00825 
00826         /* take care of initializing the ltimes field for this oper. */
00827         sinfo->ltimes = (int *) malloc (sizeof (int) * num_exits);
00828         for (i = 0; i < num_exits; i++)
00829             sinfo->ltimes[i] = -1000;
00830     }
00831 
00832     /* if last instruction in cb is not an unconditional branch, another exit
00833      * is needed. (another exit is also needed if the last instruction is
00834      * predicated) */
00835     if (!IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc) ||
00836         (L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) && !L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
00837                                                 L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))
00838       {
00839         if (cb->last_op->ext)
00840           {
00841             (*exit_ops)[exit_num] = cb->last_op;
00842           }
00843         else
00844           { /* find the latest instruction which will be scheduled. */
00845             for (oper = cb->last_op; !oper->ext; oper = oper->prev_op);
00846             (*exit_ops)[exit_num] = oper;
00847           }
00848       }
00849 
00850     return (num_exits);
00851 }
00852 
00853 void Lsched_determine_ltimes (L_Cb *cb, int num_exits, L_Oper **exit_ops)
00854 /* calculates the lates times for every operation relative to every exit. */
00855 {
00856     L_Oper      *oper, *oper1, *dep_oper;
00857     int         temp_ltime, ltime_index, max_fallthru_ltime = 0;
00858     int         fallthru_present = 0;
00859     L_Dep       *dep;
00860     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
00861 
00862     /* compute the late times for each operation based on each exit. */
00863     for (ltime_index = 0; ltime_index < num_exits; ltime_index++) {
00864         if ((ltime_index == (num_exits - 1)) &&
00865             (!IS_UCOND_BRANCH(exit_ops[ltime_index]->proc_opc) ||
00866              (L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) && !L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
00867                                                L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))) {
00868         /* if last exit is fallthru, wait until later to account for ltimes. */
00869             fallthru_present = 1;
00870             continue;
00871         }
00872 
00873         /* FOR SUCCESSIVE RETIREMENT, ltime = etime FOR AN EXIT IS NOT USED.
00874          * INSTEAD, WE SET LTIMES SO THAT EXITS ARE RETIRED IN ORDER ASAP. */
00875         if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "succ_ret"))
00876             temp_ltime = 100 * (ltime_index + 1);
00877         else
00878             temp_ltime = SCHED_INFO(exit_ops[ltime_index])->etime;
00879         SCHED_INFO(exit_ops[ltime_index])->ltimes[ltime_index] = temp_ltime;
00880 
00881         for (oper = exit_ops[ltime_index]->prev_op; oper;
00882              oper = oper->prev_op) {
00883             if (!oper->ext) /* oper does not get scheduled, so don't consider
00884                              * it. */
00885                 continue;
00886 
00887             for (dep = DEP_INFO(oper)->output_dep; dep; dep = dep->next_dep) {
00888                 if (dep->omega == 0) {
00889                     dep_oper = dep->to_oper;
00890                     if (SCHED_INFO(dep_oper)->ltimes[ltime_index] == -1000)
00891                     /* dependence goes to oper after exit op, don't use it. */
00892                         continue;
00893                     temp_ltime = SCHED_INFO(dep_oper)->ltimes[ltime_index] -
00894                                                         dep->distance;
00895                     if ((dep->type == L_DEP_CNT) &&
00896                         ((L_general_branch_opcode(dep_oper) ||
00897                          L_general_subroutine_call_opcode(dep_oper)) &&
00898                          (L_general_branch_opcode(oper) ||
00899                          L_general_subroutine_call_opcode(oper))))
00900                         if (dep->distance == 0)
00901                             temp_ltime -= Lsched_branch_increase;
00902 
00903                     if ((SCHED_INFO(oper)->ltimes[ltime_index] == -1000) ||
00904                         (temp_ltime < SCHED_INFO(oper)->ltimes[ltime_index]))
00905                         SCHED_INFO(oper)->ltimes[ltime_index] = temp_ltime;
00906                 }
00907             }
00908         }
00909     }
00910 
00911     if (fallthru_present) {
00912         /* special-case for opers that fall through the cb, and don't
00913          * have any outgoing arcs.  ltime in this case is set to ltime of fall-
00914          * through exit operation.  all its other ltimes are undefined. */
00915         for (oper = cb->last_op; oper; oper = oper->prev_op) {
00916             sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
00917             if (!oper->ext) /* oper doesn't get scheduled, don't consider it. */
00918                 continue;
00919 
00920             if (DEP_INFO(oper)->n_output_dep == 0) {
00921                 if (max_fallthru_ltime < sinfo->etime)
00922                     max_fallthru_ltime = sinfo->etime;
00923             }
00924         }
00925 
00926         /* IF SUCCESSIVE RETIREMENT USED, NEED TO ALTER max_fallthru_ltime */
00927         if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "succ_ret"))
00928             max_fallthru_ltime = 100 * num_exits;
00929 
00930         if (DEP_INFO(exit_ops[num_exits - 1])->n_output_dep != 0)
00931             L_punt ("ERROR: last fall-thru oper in cb has an outgoing dep");
00932         for (oper = cb->last_op; oper; oper = oper->prev_op) {
00933             if (!oper->ext) /* oper doesn't get scheduled, don't consider it. */
00934                 continue;
00935 
00936             if (DEP_INFO(oper)->n_output_dep == 0) {
00937                 SCHED_INFO(oper)->ltimes[num_exits - 1] = max_fallthru_ltime;
00938 
00939                 for (oper1 = oper->prev_op; oper1; oper1 = oper1->prev_op) {
00940                     if (!oper1->ext) /* oper doesn't get scheduled, so don't
00941                                       * consider it. */
00942                         continue;
00943                     for (dep = DEP_INFO(oper1)->output_dep; dep;
00944                          dep = dep->next_dep) {
00945                         if (dep->omega == 0) {
00946                             dep_oper = dep->to_oper;
00947                             if (SCHED_INFO(dep_oper)->ltimes[num_exits - 1] == -1000)
00948                             /* dependence goes to oper after exit op, so don't
00949                              * use it */
00950                                 continue;
00951                             temp_ltime = SCHED_INFO(dep_oper)->ltimes[num_exits - 1]
00952                                                                 - dep->distance;
00953                             if ((dep->type == L_DEP_CNT) &&
00954                                 ((L_general_branch_opcode(dep_oper) ||
00955                                   L_general_subroutine_call_opcode(dep_oper)) &&
00956                                  (L_general_branch_opcode(oper1) ||
00957                                   L_general_subroutine_call_opcode(oper1))))
00958                                 if (dep->distance == 0)
00959                                     temp_ltime -= Lsched_branch_increase;
00960     
00961                             if ((SCHED_INFO(oper1)->ltimes[num_exits - 1] == -1000)
00962                                   || (temp_ltime <
00963                                       SCHED_INFO(oper1)->ltimes[num_exits - 1]))
00964                                 SCHED_INFO(oper1)->ltimes[num_exits - 1] =
00965                                                                      temp_ltime;
00966                         }
00967                     }
00968                 }
00969             }
00970         }
00971     }
00972 }
00973 
00974 void Lsched_calculate_priority_normal(L_Cb *cb, int num_exits, 
00975                                       L_Oper **exit_ops)
00976 /* calculates priority for each operation.  this is done the normal
00977  * way (the method used previously by the scheduler). */
00978 {
00979     L_Oper      *oper;
00980     int         i, max_ltime = 0;
00981     float       priority, *probs;
00982     L_Flow      *flow;
00983     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
00984 
00985     /* compute the probs present for each exit. */
00986     probs = (float *) malloc (sizeof (float) * num_exits);
00987     if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "real")) {
00988         if (cb->weight == 0) {
00989             for (i = 0; i < (num_exits - 1); i++)
00990                 probs[i] = 0;
00991             probs[num_exits - 1] = 1.0;
00992         }
00993         else {
00994             probs[num_exits - 1] = 1.0;
00995             /* NOTE: I am assuming that jump_rg's are not predicated.  This is a
00996              *       valid assumption for the current IMPACT */
00997             for (i = 0; i < (num_exits - 1); i++) {
00998                 flow = L_find_flow_for_branch (cb, exit_ops[i]);
00999                 probs[i] = flow->weight / cb->weight;
01000                 probs[num_exits - 1] -= probs[i];
01001             }
01002         }
01003     }
01004     else if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "all_1")) {
01005         for (i = 0; i < num_exits; i++)
01006             probs[i] = (float) 1 / (float) num_exits;
01007     }
01008     else if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "last_1")) {
01009         for (i = 0; i < (num_exits - 1); i++)
01010             probs[i] = 0;
01011         probs[num_exits - 1] = 1.0;
01012     }
01013     else if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "first_1")) {
01014         probs[0] = 1.0;
01015         for (i = 1; i < num_exits; i++)
01016             probs[i] = 0;
01017     }
01018     else if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "succ_ret")) {
01019     /* late times have been modified earlier for successive retirement, so
01020      * setting all the probabilities to one is what is desired here. */
01021         for (i = 0; i < num_exits; i++)
01022             probs[i] = 1;
01023     }
01024     else
01025         L_punt ("ERROR: illegal value for parameter, \"profile_info_to_use\" \
01026 encountered.");
01027 
01028     for (oper = cb->last_op; oper; oper = oper->prev_op) {
01029     /* find the max late time present in this cb. */
01030         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01031         if (!oper->ext) /* oper does not get scheduled, don't consider it. */
01032             continue;
01033         if (max_ltime < sinfo->etime)
01034             max_ltime = sinfo->etime;
01035     }
01036 
01037     /* max_ltime FOR SUCCESSIVE RETIREMENT MUST BE EXPLICITELY SET TO ITS
01038      * CORRECT VALUE BECAUSE ltimes ARE INDEPENDENT OF etimes */
01039     if (!strcmp (Lsched_profile_info_to_use, "succ_ret"))
01040        max_ltime = 100 * num_exits;
01041 
01042     /* compute the priority for each operation. */
01043     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op) {
01044         if (!oper->ext) /* oper does not get scheduled, so don't consider it. */
01045             continue;
01046         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01047 
01048         priority = 0;
01049         for (i = 0; i < num_exits; i++)
01050             if (sinfo->ltimes[i] != -1000) {
01051                 if (probs[i] == 0) /* added because zero weight exits that end
01052                                     * a block cannot use dependence height to
01053                                     * determine importance otherwise. */
01054                     probs[i] = 0.00001;
01055                 priority += ((float) max_ltime + 1.0 - 
01056                                           (float) sinfo->ltimes[i]) * probs[i];
01057             }
01058         sinfo->priority = priority;
01059     }
01060 
01061     free (probs);
01062 }
01063 
01064 
01065 /******************************************************************************\
01066  *
01067  * Routines to compute static scheduling heuristics
01068  *
01069 \******************************************************************************/
01070 
01071 /* Leaf node types */
01072 #define FALL_THRU       0
01073 #define UBR_TAKEN       1
01074 #define CBR_TAKEN       2
01075 
01076 typedef struct 
01077 {
01078     int         num_opers;
01079     L_Oper      **oper;
01080     int         type;
01081     int         initial_height;
01082     float       prob;
01083     int         *heights;
01084 } LEAF;
01085 
01086 #if 0
01087 static void Lsched_compute_height(cb, leaf, num_opers, stack)
01088     L_Cb        *cb;
01089     LEAF        *leaf;
01090     int         num_opers;
01091     L_Oper      **stack;
01092 {
01093     L_Dep       *dep;
01094     L_Oper      *oper, *dep_oper;
01095     Sched_Info  *dep_sinfo, *sinfo;
01096     int         i, height, temp_height, top_of_stack=0, dep_index;
01097 
01098     /* Initialize distance to end of computation chain */
01099     for (i=0; i<num_opers; i++)
01100         leaf->heights[i] = -1;
01101 
01102     /* Put all of the opers on the stack */
01103     for (i = 0; i < leaf->num_opers; i++)
01104     {
01105         stack[top_of_stack++] = oper = leaf->oper[i];
01106         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01107         leaf->heights[sinfo->index] = leaf->initial_height;
01108         sinfo->on_stack=1;
01109     }
01110 
01111     while (top_of_stack > 0)
01112     {
01113         oper = stack[--top_of_stack];
01114         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01115         sinfo->on_stack = 0;
01116         height = leaf->heights[sinfo->index];
01117 
01118         for (dep=DEP_INFO(oper)->input_dep; dep!=0; dep=dep->next_dep)
01119         {
01120             dep_oper = dep->from_oper;
01121 
01122             dep_sinfo = SCHED_INFO(dep_oper);
01123             dep_index = dep_sinfo->index;
01124 
01125             temp_height = height + dep->distance;
01126 
01127             /* We only increase the height for the control dependence path */
01128             if ((dep->type == L_DEP_CNT) && (dep->distance == 0))
01129                 temp_height += Lsched_branch_increase;
01130 
01131             if (temp_height > leaf->heights[dep_index])
01132             {
01133                 leaf->heights[dep_index] = temp_height;
01134                 if (dep_sinfo->on_stack==0)
01135                 {
01136                     stack[top_of_stack++] = dep_oper;
01137                     dep_sinfo->on_stack = 1;
01138                 }
01139             }
01140         }
01141     }
01142 }
01143 
01144 static void Lsched_compute_static_priorities (cb)
01145     L_Cb        *cb;
01146 {
01147     L_Oper      *oper, *stack;
01148     double      cb_weight;              
01149     float       fall_thru_prob;
01150     L_Flow      *flow;
01151     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
01152     int         i, j, num_leaves=0, num_opers=0, max_level=0,
01153                 fall_thru_leaf_needed=0, num_fall_thru_opers=0;
01154     LEAF        *leaves;
01155 
01156     L_compute_dependence_level(cb);
01157 
01158     /* 
01159      * Determine number of instructions, assign them a unique zero-
01160      * relative index, and determine the number of leaf nodes.
01161      */
01162     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
01163     {
01164         if (oper->ext!=NULL)
01165         {
01166             if (IS_UCOND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc))
01167                 num_leaves++;
01168             else if (IS_COND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc))
01169                 num_leaves++;
01170 
01171             SCHED_INFO(oper)->index = num_opers++;
01172 
01173             if (DEP_INFO(oper)->n_output_dep == 0)
01174                 num_fall_thru_opers++;
01175 
01176             if (DEP_INFO(oper)->level > max_level)
01177                 max_level = DEP_INFO(oper)->level;
01178 
01179         }
01180     }
01181 
01182     /* 
01183      * If the last instruction in the CB is not an unconditional branch
01184      * then we need to create a fall-thru node.
01185      */
01186     if (!IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc))
01187     {
01188         num_leaves++;
01189         fall_thru_leaf_needed = 1;
01190     }
01191 
01192     /* Create and initialize information for leaf nodes structures */
01193     leaves = (LEAF*) malloc (sizeof(LEAF) * num_leaves);
01194     stack = (L_Oper*) malloc(sizeof(L_Oper*) * num_opers);
01195 
01196     /* Initialize leaves and probabilities */
01197     if (cb->weight!=0)
01198         cb_weight = cb->weight;
01199     else
01200         cb_weight = 1.0;
01201     fall_thru_prob = 1.0;
01202 
01203     for (i=0, oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
01204     {
01205         if (oper->ext!=NULL)
01206         {
01207             if (IS_UCOND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc))
01208             {
01209                 leaves[i].num_opers = 1;
01210                 leaves[i].oper = (L_Oper**) malloc(sizeof(L_Oper**));
01211                 leaves[i].oper[0] = oper;
01212                 leaves[i].type = UBR_TAKEN;
01213                 if (Lsched_pad_height)
01214                     leaves[i].initial_height = max_level - DEP_INFO(oper)->level + 1;
01215                 else
01216                     leaves[i].initial_height = 1;
01217 
01218                 flow = L_find_flow_for_branch(cb, oper);
01219                 leaves[i].prob = flow->weight / cb_weight;
01220                 fall_thru_prob -= leaves[i].prob;
01221 
01222                 leaves[i].heights = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int *) * (num_opers));
01223                 i++;
01224             }
01225             else if (IS_COND_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc))
01226             {
01227                 /* Taken path */
01228                 leaves[i].num_opers = 1;
01229                 leaves[i].oper = (L_Oper**) malloc(sizeof(L_Oper**));
01230                 leaves[i].oper[0] = oper;
01231                 leaves[i].type = CBR_TAKEN;
01232                 if (Lsched_pad_height)
01233                     leaves[i].initial_height = max_level - DEP_INFO(oper)->level + 1;
01234                 else
01235                     leaves[i].initial_height = 1;
01236 
01237                 flow = L_find_flow_for_branch(cb, oper);
01238                 leaves[i].prob = flow->weight / cb_weight;
01239                 fall_thru_prob -= leaves[i].prob;
01240 
01241                 leaves[i].heights = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int *) * (num_opers));
01242                 i++;
01243             }
01244         }
01245     }
01246 
01247     /*
01248      * We will link all instructions that have no outgoing arcs
01249      * to the fall-thru leaf.
01250      */
01251     if (fall_thru_leaf_needed)
01252     {
01253         leaves[i].num_opers = num_fall_thru_opers;
01254         leaves[i].oper = (L_Oper**) malloc(sizeof(L_Oper**) * num_fall_thru_opers);
01255         leaves[i].type = FALL_THRU;
01256         leaves[i].initial_height = 1; 
01257         leaves[i].prob = fall_thru_prob;
01258         leaves[i].heights = (int *) malloc(sizeof(int *) * (num_opers));
01259         j = 0;
01260 
01261         for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
01262         {
01263             if (oper->ext!=NULL)
01264             {
01265                 if (DEP_INFO(oper)->n_output_dep == 0)
01266                 {
01267                     leaves[i].oper[j] = oper;
01268                     j++;
01269                 }
01270             }
01271         }
01272     }
01273 
01274     /* Determine heights from all leaves to all parent nodes */
01275     for (i=0; i < num_leaves; i++)
01276         Lsched_compute_height(cb, &leaves[i], num_opers, stack);
01277 
01278     if (Lsched_debug_operation_priority)
01279     {
01280         fprintf (stdout, "> CB %d - leaf node probabilities and heights\n", cb->id);
01281 
01282         for (i=0; i < num_leaves; i++)
01283         {
01284             switch (leaves[i].type)
01285             {
01286                 case FALL_THRU:
01287                     fprintf (stdout, 
01288                         ">   FALL_THRU num_opers=%d: instr prob=%f, initial_height=%d\n", 
01289                         leaves[i].num_opers, leaves[i].prob, leaves[i].initial_height);
01290                     break;
01291                 case UBR_TAKEN:
01292                     fprintf (stdout, 
01293                         ">   UBR_TAKEN LEAF op %d: taken prob=%f, initial_height=%d\n", 
01294                         leaves[i].oper[0]->id, leaves[i].prob, leaves[i].initial_height);
01295                     break;
01296                 case CBR_TAKEN:
01297                     fprintf (stdout, 
01298                         ">   CBR_TAKEN LEAF op %d: taken prob=%f, initial_height=%d\n", 
01299                         leaves[i].oper[0]->id, leaves[i].prob, leaves[i].initial_height);
01300                     break;
01301             }
01302         }
01303 
01304         fprintf (stdout, "> operation priorities, (heights, ...)\n");
01305     }
01306 
01307     /* Compute static priority proportional to the average height */
01308     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
01309     {
01310         int index;
01311 
01312         if (oper->ext!=NULL)
01313         {
01314             sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01315             index = sinfo->index;
01316             sinfo->priority = 0; /* needs to be initialized (for postpass
01317                                   * scheduling when sinfo is saved from
01318                                   * prepass scheduling.) */
01319 
01320 #if 0
01321             if (IS_BRANCH(oper->proc_opc))
01322                 sinfo->priority = .01;
01323             else
01324                 sinfo->priority = 0.0;
01325 #endif
01326 
01327             for (i = 0; i < num_leaves; i++)
01328                 if (leaves[i].heights[index] != -1)
01329                     sinfo->priority += leaves[i].prob * leaves[i].heights[index];
01330 
01331             if (Lsched_debug_operation_priority)
01332             {
01333                 fprintf (stdout, ">   op %d: %f (",  oper->id, 
01334                     sinfo->priority); 
01335 
01336                 for (i=0; i < num_leaves; i++)
01337                 {
01338                     if (leaves[i].heights[index] != -1)
01339                         fprintf (stdout, "%d", leaves[i].heights[index]);
01340                     else
01341                         fprintf (stdout, "-");
01342 
01343                     if (i+1 < num_leaves) fprintf (stdout, ",");
01344                 }
01345 
01346                 fprintf (stdout, ")\n");
01347             }
01348         }
01349     }
01350 
01351     /* release memory */
01352     for (i=0; i < num_leaves; i++)
01353         free(leaves[i].heights);
01354 
01355     free (leaves);
01356     free (stack);
01357 }
01358 #endif
01359 
01360 /******************************************************************************\
01361  *
01362  *  Misc. routines
01363  *
01364 \******************************************************************************/
01365 
01366 int     Lsched_is_branch(int proc_opc)
01367 {
01368     if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB)) 
01369         return IS_CTL(proc_opc);
01370     else
01371         return IS_BRANCH(proc_opc);
01372 }
01373 
01374 L_Oper *L_find_next_branch(L_Cb *cb, L_Oper *oper)
01375 {
01376     L_Oper *ptr;
01377 
01378     if (oper==NULL)
01379         ptr = cb->first_op;
01380     else
01381         ptr = oper->next_op;
01382 
01383     for (; ptr!=NULL; ptr=ptr->next_op) 
01384         if (Lsched_is_branch(ptr->proc_opc)) return ptr;
01385 
01386     return NULL;
01387 }
01388 
01389 void L_annotate_instr(L_Cb *cb)
01390 {
01391     L_Oper      *oper;
01392     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
01393     L_Attr      *new_attr;
01394 
01395     if (!Lsched_print_hb_and_spec) return;
01396 
01397     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
01398     {
01399         if (oper->ext!=0)
01400         {
01401             sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01402 
01403             new_attr = L_new_attr("spec_dist", 1);
01404             L_set_int_attr_field(new_attr, 0, sinfo->home_block -
01405                 sinfo->current_block);
01406             oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr, new_attr);
01407 
01408             new_attr = L_new_attr("hb", 1);
01409             L_set_int_attr_field(new_attr, 0, sinfo->home_block);
01410             oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr, new_attr);
01411         }
01412     }
01413 }
01414 
01415 /******************************************************************************\
01416  *
01417  *
01418  *
01419 \******************************************************************************/
01420 
01421 void Lsched_make_ready(L_Cb *cb, int oper_issue_time, Sched_Info *sinfo, 
01422                        Sched_Info *dep_sinfo, int to_index, int from_index,
01423                        int distance)
01424 {
01425     int         complete_time, is_delay_op, dep_ready_time; 
01426 
01427     /* Remove the dependence from the instruction */ 
01428     dep_sinfo->num_depend--;
01429 
01430     /* 
01431      * Determine the completion time for the dependent operand
01432      *
01433      * In the event that we are deleting a check instruction,
01434      * we must be able to put any dependent operations
01435      * on the pending_ready list.  Since the check was
01436      * never scheduled, it will have no alternative.
01437      * Zero is used for the default base case.
01438      */
01439     if (!Lsched_infinite_issue && (RU_SELECTED_ALT(sinfo->ru_info)==NULL) && 
01440         (sinfo->proc_opc!=Lop_CHECK))
01441         L_punt("Lsched_make_ready: instruction without alt was not a check!");
01442 
01443     if (sinfo->proc_opc==Lop_CHECK)
01444         complete_time = oper_issue_time;
01445     else if (Lsched_infinite_issue)
01446         complete_time = oper_issue_time + mdes_operand_latency(sinfo->proc_opc, 
01447             mdes_heuristic_alt_id(sinfo->proc_opc), from_index);
01448     else
01449         complete_time = oper_issue_time + mdes_operand_latency(sinfo->proc_opc, 
01450             RU_SELECTED_ALT_ID(sinfo->ru_info), from_index);
01451     
01452 #if 0
01453     if ((Lsched_processor_model==MDES_VLIW) && 
01454         (L_register_branch_opcode(dep_sinfo->oper) || 
01455          L_subroutine_call_opcode(dep_sinfo->oper)))
01456         complete_time = oper_issue_time + distance;
01457     else if (sinfo->proc_opc==Lop_CHECK)
01458         complete_time = oper_issue_time;
01459     else if (Lsched_infinite_issue)
01460         complete_time = oper_issue_time + mdes_operand_latency(sinfo->proc_opc, 
01461             mdes_heuristic_alt_id(sinfo->proc_opc), from_index);
01462     else
01463         complete_time = oper_issue_time + mdes_operand_latency(sinfo->proc_opc, 
01464             RU_SELECTED_ALT_ID(sinfo->ru_info), from_index);
01465 #endif
01466 
01467     /* Update the ready time for the dependent operand */
01468     if (complete_time > dep_sinfo->operand_ready_times[to_index])
01469         dep_sinfo->operand_ready_times[to_index] = complete_time;
01470 
01471         /* 
01472          * Determine the earliest ready time based upon the operand
01473          * ready times.
01474          *
01475          * This code keeps a running tally of the latest zero-cycle
01476          * dependency.  Given a tie for the latest, it chooses the
01477          * zero-cycle dependency forcing the latest slot in
01478          * a cycle.
01479          */
01480         if (oper_issue_time > dep_sinfo->ready_time)
01481         {
01482             dep_sinfo->ready_time = oper_issue_time;
01483             dep_sinfo->earliest_slot = sinfo->issue_slot;
01484         }
01485         else if (oper_issue_time == dep_sinfo->ready_time)
01486         {
01487             if (dep_sinfo->earliest_slot < (sinfo->issue_slot))
01488                 dep_sinfo->earliest_slot = sinfo->issue_slot;
01489         }
01490 
01491 #if 0
01492     if (Lsched_processor_model!=MDES_VLIW)
01493     {
01494         /* 
01495          * Determine the earliest ready time based upon the operand
01496          * ready times.
01497          *
01498          * This code keeps a running tally of the latest zero-cycle
01499          * dependency.  Given a tie for the latest, it chooses the
01500          * zero-cycle dependency forcing the latest slot in
01501          * a cycle.
01502          */
01503         if (oper_issue_time > dep_sinfo->ready_time)
01504         {
01505             dep_sinfo->ready_time = oper_issue_time;
01506             dep_sinfo->earliest_slot = sinfo->issue_slot;
01507         }
01508         else if (oper_issue_time == dep_sinfo->ready_time)
01509         {
01510             if (dep_sinfo->earliest_slot < (sinfo->issue_slot))
01511                 dep_sinfo->earliest_slot = sinfo->issue_slot;
01512         }
01513     }
01514 #endif
01515 
01516     /* Take care of the "ready" instructions */
01517     if ((dep_sinfo->num_depend==0) && 
01518         (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(dep_sinfo->oper->flags, FILLER)))
01519     {
01520         /* Initialize the ready time for the current instruction */
01521         dep_ready_time = mdes_calc_min_ready_time(dep_sinfo->mdes_info, 
01522             dep_sinfo->operand_ready_times);
01523 
01524         /* 
01525          * If the actual ready time for this instruction is not 
01526          * equal to the running tally of the latest zero-cycle
01527          * dependancy, then we must reset the earliest_slot
01528          * to prevent poor schedules at later issue_times.
01529          */
01530         if (dep_ready_time > dep_sinfo->ready_time)
01531         {
01532             dep_sinfo->ready_time = dep_ready_time;
01533             dep_sinfo->earliest_slot = 0;
01534         }
01535 
01536         if (Lsched_fill_delay_slots) 
01537             is_delay_op = Lsched_update_ctl_delay_sinfo(not_ready_queue, dep_sinfo);
01538         else
01539             is_delay_op = 0;
01540 
01541         if (!is_delay_op)
01542         {
01543             L_dequeue(not_ready_queue, dep_sinfo);
01544 
01545             L_enqueue_min_to_max_1 (pending_ready_queue, dep_sinfo, 
01546                 (float) dep_sinfo->ready_time);
01547         }
01548     }
01549 }
01550 
01551 void Lsched_schedule_op(L_Cb *cb, Sched_Info *sinfo, int spec, int ready_time) 
01552 {
01553     int         i, to_index, latency;
01554     L_Oper      *oper=sinfo->oper;
01555     Dep_Info    *dep_info=sinfo->dep_info;
01556     L_Dep       *dep;
01557 
01558     /* Update register pressure estimates */
01559     L_update_virt_reg(sinfo);
01560 
01561     /* Mark the instruction as speculative */
01562     if (spec)
01563     {
01564         oper->flags=L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, L_OPER_SPECULATIVE);
01565 
01566         if (!(L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(oper->flags, L_OPER_SAFE_PEI)) && 
01567             (any_alt_flag_set(sinfo->mdes_info, ALT_FLAG_SILENT)))  {
01568             oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, L_OPER_MASK_PE);
01569             /* REH 4/19/95 - Make sure that function mask flag is set */
01570             L_fn->flags   = L_SET_BIT_FLAG(L_fn->flags, L_FUNC_MASK_PE);
01571         }
01572     }
01573     else
01574         oper->flags=L_CLR_BIT_FLAG(oper->flags, L_OPER_SPECULATIVE);
01575 
01576 
01577     /* Mark the issue time and completion times */
01578     sinfo->issue_time = ready_time;
01579 #if 0
01580 /* no longer needed. BLD 6/95 */
01581     if (Lsched_infinite_issue)
01582         sinfo->completion_time = ready_time + mdes_max_completion_time(sinfo->proc_opc, 
01583             mdes_heuristic_alt_id(sinfo->proc_opc));
01584     else
01585         sinfo->completion_time = ready_time + mdes_max_completion_time(sinfo->proc_opc, 
01586             RU_SELECTED_ALT_ID(sinfo->ru_info)); 
01587 #endif
01588     /* Also mark the relative latencies associated with each dest operand */
01589     for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01590     {
01591         if ( oper->dest[i] != NULL )
01592         {
01593             to_index = operand_index(MDES_DEST, i);
01594             latency = max_operand_time(sinfo->mdes_info, to_index);
01595             sinfo->relative_latency[i] = latency;
01596         }
01597     }
01598 
01599     switch (L_spec_model)
01600     {
01601 #if 0
01602         case SENTINEL:
01603         case SRB:
01604             L_sentinel_update_block(cb, oper, ready_time);
01605             break;
01606 #endif
01607         
01608         case WRITEBACK_SUPPRESSION:
01609             wbs_remove_check(cb, sinfo, ready_time);
01610             break;
01611 
01612         case MCB:
01613             L_mcb_remove_check(cb,oper,ready_time);
01614             break;
01615     }
01616 
01617     /* Place the sorted instructions into scheduled queue */
01618     sinfo->scheduled = 1;
01619     L_dequeue_from_all(sinfo);
01620     L_enqueue_min_to_max_2 (scheduled_queue, sinfo, (float) sinfo->issue_time,
01621         (float) sinfo->issue_slot);
01622  
01623     if (Lsched_debug_messages)  
01624     {
01625         if (spec)
01626             fprintf (stdout, "> <S> ");
01627         else
01628             fprintf (stdout, "> ");
01629 
01630         fprintf (stdout, "scheduled op %d: ready=%d, issue=%d, slot=%d, sched block=%d",
01631             oper->id, sinfo->ready_time, sinfo->issue_time, sinfo->issue_slot, 
01632             sinfo->current_block);
01633 
01634         if (spec)
01635             fprintf (stdout, ", home block=%d\n", sinfo->home_block);
01636         else
01637             fprintf (stdout, "\n");
01638     }
01639  
01640     /* 
01641      * Remove dependences from instruction that are dependent on  instruction
01642      * that was just scheduled.  Place any of them that have no remaining 
01643      * dependences into the pending ready list.
01644      */
01645     for (dep=dep_info->output_dep; dep!=0; dep=dep->next_dep)
01646     {
01647         Lsched_make_ready(cb, ready_time, sinfo, SCHED_INFO(dep->to_oper), 
01648             dep->to_index, dep->from_index, dep->distance);
01649     }
01650 }
01651 
01652 int Lsched_can_schedule_op (L_Cb *cb, Sched_Info *sinfo, int current_time, 
01653     int current_block, int *issue_slot, int *spec, int *silent)
01654 {
01655 
01656     int         earliest_slot, latest_slot, can_sched;
01657     Sched_Info  *prev_br_sinfo=NULL;
01658 
01659     *spec = 0;
01660     *silent = 0;
01661 
01662 #if 0
01663     /* Determine if operation is speculative, and attempt to schedule it */
01664     if (Lsched_processor_model==MDES_VLIW)
01665     {
01666         /*
01667          * We are assuming that any instruction scheduled in the
01668          * same cycle of a branch or earlier than the branch whose
01669          * home block is physically after the branch, is speculative
01670          *
01671          * We also ignore zero-cycle latency problems with vliw
01672          * models.
01673          */
01674         if (sinfo->home_block>current_block)
01675         {
01676             *spec = 1;
01677 
01678             if ( (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond == DEP_SILENT) || 
01679                  (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond == DEP_DELAYS_EXCEPTION) )
01680                 *silent = ALT_FLAG_SILENT;
01681         }
01682 
01683         earliest_slot = 0;
01684         latest_slot = Lsched_total_issue_slots;
01685 
01686         if ((*issue_slot = RU_can_schedule_op(sinfo->ru_info, sinfo->mdes_info,
01687             sinfo->operand_ready_times,
01688             current_time, earliest_slot, latest_slot, *silent))==-1)
01689             return CANT_SCHEDULE;
01690     }
01691     else
01692 #endif
01693     {
01694         /*
01695          * There are three cases for scheduling an instruction for superscalar
01696          * processors:
01697          *
01698          * 1) Instruction is scheduled in an earlier cycle than its previous 
01699          *    branch - this instruction is clearly speculative.
01700          *
01701          * 2) Instruction is scheduled in a later cycle than its previous 
01702          *    branch - this instruction is clearly not speculative.
01703          *
01704          * 3) Instruction is scheduled in the same cycle as its previous
01705          *    branch - this instruction will be speculative if it is scheduled
01706          *    in a slot prior to its previous branch and non-speculative
01707          *    otherwise.
01708          *
01709          * We must handle all of these conditions.
01710          *
01711          * Earliest slot handles zero cycle dependences, latest slot handles
01712          * speculative condition.
01713          */
01714 
01715         if (sinfo->ready_time < current_time)
01716             sinfo->earliest_slot=0;
01717         earliest_slot = sinfo->earliest_slot;
01718 
01719         if (sinfo->prev_br)
01720             prev_br_sinfo = SCHED_INFO(sinfo->prev_br);
01721         else
01722             prev_br_sinfo = NULL;
01723 
01724         if (prev_br_sinfo && 
01725             ((!prev_br_sinfo->scheduled) || (prev_br_sinfo->issue_time > current_time)))
01726         {
01727             /* Case 1 - must be speculative */
01728 
01729             *spec = 1;
01730             if ( (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond == DEP_SILENT) || 
01731                  (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond == DEP_DELAYS_EXCEPTION) )
01732                 *silent = ALT_FLAG_SILENT;
01733 
01734             latest_slot = Lsched_total_issue_slots;
01735 
01736             if (Lsched_infinite_issue) 
01737             {
01738                 *issue_slot = Lsched_infinite_issue_slot++;
01739                 return CAN_SCHEDULE;
01740             }
01741 
01742             /* Is it feasible to schedule the instruction in this cycle ? */
01743             if ((*issue_slot = RU_can_schedule_op(sinfo->ru_info, sinfo->mdes_info,
01744                  sinfo->operand_ready_times,
01745                  current_time, earliest_slot, latest_slot, *silent))==-1)
01746                     return CANT_SCHEDULE;
01747         }
01748         else if (!prev_br_sinfo || 
01749                  (prev_br_sinfo->scheduled && prev_br_sinfo->issue_time < current_time))
01750         {
01751             /* Case 2 - definitely not speculative */
01752             latest_slot = Lsched_total_issue_slots;
01753 
01754             if (Lsched_infinite_issue) 
01755             {
01756                 *issue_slot = Lsched_infinite_issue_slot++;
01757                 return CAN_SCHEDULE;
01758             }
01759 
01760             /* Is it feasible to schedule the instruction in this cycle ? */
01761             if ((*issue_slot = RU_can_schedule_op(sinfo->ru_info, sinfo->mdes_info,
01762                     sinfo->operand_ready_times,
01763                     current_time, earliest_slot, latest_slot, *silent))==-1)
01764                 return CANT_SCHEDULE;
01765         }
01766         else
01767         {
01768             if (prev_br_sinfo->issue_time != current_time)
01769                 L_punt ("Lsched_can_schedule_op: error in logic dummy!");
01770 
01771             /* 
01772              * Case 3 - Maybe speculative depending on where it is scheduled.
01773              * This case means that there is a prev_branch and its scheduled
01774              * time is the current_time.
01775              */
01776 
01777             /* Try to schedule the instruction speculatively first. */
01778             can_sched = CANT_SCHEDULE;
01779             latest_slot = prev_br_sinfo->issue_slot;
01780 
01781 
01782             if (earliest_slot <= latest_slot) 
01783             {
01784                 if ( (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond == DEP_SILENT) || 
01785                      (sinfo->dep_info->spec_cond == DEP_DELAYS_EXCEPTION) )
01786                     *silent = ALT_FLAG_SILENT;
01787 
01788                 if (Lsched_infinite_issue) 
01789                 {
01790                     *issue_slot = Lsched_infinite_issue_slot++;
01791                     return CAN_SCHEDULE;
01792                 }
01793 
01794                 *spec = 1;
01795 
01796                 /* Is it feasible to schedule the instruction in this cycle ? */
01797                 if ((*issue_slot = RU_can_schedule_op(sinfo->ru_info, sinfo->mdes_info,
01798                     sinfo->operand_ready_times,
01799                     current_time, earliest_slot, latest_slot, *silent))!=-1)
01800                      can_sched = CAN_SCHEDULE;
01801             }
01802 
01803             if (can_sched != CAN_SCHEDULE)
01804             {
01805                 /* 
01806                  * Since it was not possible to schedule this instruction speculatively,
01807                  * try to schedule it non-speculatively.
01808                  */
01809                 if (latest_slot > earliest_slot) earliest_slot = latest_slot;
01810 
01811                 latest_slot = Lsched_total_issue_slots;
01812 
01813                 *spec = 0;
01814                 *silent = 0;
01815 
01816                 if (Lsched_infinite_issue) 
01817                 {
01818                     *issue_slot = Lsched_infinite_issue_slot++;
01819                     return CAN_SCHEDULE;
01820                 }
01821 
01822                 /* Is it feasible to schedule the instruction in this cycle ? */
01823                 if ((*issue_slot = RU_can_schedule_op(sinfo->ru_info, sinfo->mdes_info, 
01824                     sinfo->operand_ready_times,
01825                     current_time, earliest_slot, latest_slot, *silent))==-1)
01826                     return CANT_SCHEDULE;
01827             }
01828         }
01829     }
01830 
01831     return CAN_SCHEDULE;
01832 }
01833 
01834 /******************************************************************************\
01835  *
01836  * Corrects vliw schedule for cross basic block dependences.  This ensures
01837  * accurate execution in the absense of interlock.
01838  *
01839 \******************************************************************************/
01840 
01841 static L_Oper *Lsched_create_nop(int issue_time, int issue_slot)
01842 {
01843     L_Oper      *new_oper;
01844     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
01845     L_Attr      *new_attr;
01846 
01847     new_oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_NO_OP);
01848     sinfo = L_create_sched_info(new_oper, 0, NULL, NULL);
01849     new_oper->ext = (void *) sinfo;
01850 
01851     new_attr = L_new_attr("vliw_pad", 0);
01852     new_oper->attr = L_concat_attr(new_oper->attr, new_attr);
01853     sinfo->issue_time = issue_time;
01854     sinfo->issue_slot = issue_slot;
01855 #if 0
01856 /* no dest operands, so relative latencies are unchanged. BLD 6/95 */
01857     sinfo->completion_time = issue_time + 
01858         mdes_max_completion_time(Lop_NO_OP, mdes_heuristic_alt_id(Lop_NO_OP));
01859 #endif
01860 
01861     return new_oper;
01862 }
01863 
01864 static L_Oper *Lsched_create_jump(int issue_time, int issue_slot, 
01865     L_Operand *target)
01866 {
01867     L_Oper      *new_oper;
01868     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
01869 
01870     new_oper = L_create_new_op(Lop_JUMP);
01871     new_oper->src[0] = L_copy_operand(target);
01872     sinfo = L_create_sched_info(new_oper, 0, NULL, NULL);
01873     new_oper->ext = (void *) sinfo;
01874     sinfo->issue_time = issue_time;
01875     sinfo->issue_slot = issue_slot;
01876 #if 0
01877 /* no dest operands, so relative latencies are unchanged. BLD 6/95 */
01878     sinfo->completion_time = issue_time + 
01879         mdes_max_completion_time(Lop_JUMP, mdes_heuristic_alt_id(Lop_JUMP));
01880 #endif
01881 
01882     return new_oper;
01883 }
01884 
01885 static void Lsched_pad_slots_with_nops(L_Cb *cb)
01886 {
01887     L_Oper      *oper;
01888     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
01889     int         i, j, issue_time, last_time, issue_slot, last_slot = 0,
01890                 max_slot, found=0;
01891 
01892     last_time = 0;
01893     max_slot = Lsched_total_issue_slots-1;
01894 
01895     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper!= NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
01896     {
01897         if (IS_IGNORE(oper->proc_opc)) continue;
01898 
01899         found = 1;
01900 
01901         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
01902         issue_time = sinfo->issue_time;
01903         issue_slot = sinfo->issue_slot;
01904 
01905         if (issue_time != last_time)
01906         {
01907             /* Fill in the unused slots from the last cycle */
01908             if (Lsched_pad_vliw_slots_with_nops)
01909                 for (i=last_slot+1; i<=max_slot; i++)
01910                     L_insert_oper_before(cb, oper, 
01911                         Lsched_create_nop(last_time, i));
01912 
01913             /* Fill in the unused cycles */
01914             for (j=last_time+1; j<issue_time; j++)
01915             {
01916                 L_insert_oper_before(cb, oper, Lsched_create_nop(j, 0));
01917 
01918                 if (Lsched_pad_vliw_slots_with_nops)
01919                     for (i=1; i<max_slot; i++)
01920                         L_insert_oper_before(cb, oper, Lsched_create_nop(j, i));
01921             }
01922 
01923             if (Lsched_pad_vliw_slots_with_nops && (issue_slot != 0))
01924             {
01925                 for (i=0; i<issue_slot; i++)
01926                     L_insert_oper_before(cb, oper, 
01927                         Lsched_create_nop(issue_time, i));
01928             }
01929         }
01930         else if (Lsched_pad_vliw_slots_with_nops && 
01931             (issue_slot != ((last_slot+1)%Lsched_total_issue_slots)))
01932         {
01933             for (i=(last_slot+1)%Lsched_total_issue_slots; 
01934                  i<issue_slot; i++)
01935                 L_insert_oper_before(cb, oper, 
01936                     Lsched_create_nop(issue_time, i));
01937         }
01938         last_time = issue_time;
01939         last_slot = issue_slot;
01940     }
01941 
01942     /* Fill in the unused slots from the last cycle */
01943     if ((found) && (Lsched_pad_vliw_slots_with_nops))
01944         for (i=last_slot+1; i<=max_slot; i++)
01945             L_insert_oper_after(cb, cb->last_op, 
01946                 Lsched_create_nop(last_time, i));
01947 
01948 }
01949 
01950 #define NO_CB_PAD       0x7FFFFFFF
01951 int Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(L_Cb *cb)
01952 {
01953     L_Attr *attr;
01954 
01955     if ((attr = L_find_attr(cb->attr, "start_pad"))!= 0)
01956         return attr->field[0]->value.i;
01957     else
01958         return NO_CB_PAD;
01959 }
01960 
01961 void Lsched_create_cb_start_pad(L_Cb *cb, int pad_value)
01962 {
01963     L_Attr *attr;
01964 
01965     if ((attr = L_find_attr(cb->attr, "start_pad"))!= 0)
01966         attr->field[0]->value.i = pad_value;
01967     else
01968     {
01969         attr = L_new_attr("start_pad", 1);
01970         L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, pad_value);
01971         cb->attr = L_concat_attr(cb->attr, attr);
01972     }
01973 }
01974 
01975 int Lsched_get_cb_end_pad_value(L_Cb *cb)
01976 {
01977     L_Attr *attr;
01978 
01979     if ((attr = L_find_attr(cb->attr, "end_pad"))!= 0)
01980         return attr->field[0]->value.i;
01981     else
01982         return 0;
01983 }
01984 
01985 void Lsched_create_cb_end_pad(L_Cb *cb, int pad_value)
01986 {
01987     L_Attr *attr;
01988 
01989     if ((attr = L_find_attr(cb->attr, "end_pad"))!= 0)
01990         attr->field[0]->value.i = pad_value;
01991     else
01992     {
01993         attr = L_new_attr("end_pad", 1);
01994         L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, pad_value);
01995         cb->attr = L_concat_attr(cb->attr, attr);
01996     }
01997 }
01998 
01999 int Lsched_get_br_pad_value(L_Oper *oper)
02000 {
02001     L_Attr *attr;
02002 
02003     if ((attr = L_find_attr(oper->attr, "br_pad"))!= 0)
02004         return attr->field[0]->value.i;
02005     else
02006         return 0;
02007 }
02008 
02009 void Lsched_create_br_pad(L_Oper *oper, int pad_value)
02010 {
02011     L_Attr *attr;
02012 
02013     if ((attr = L_find_attr(oper->attr, "br_pad"))!= 0)
02014         attr->field[0]->value.i = pad_value;
02015     else
02016     {
02017         attr = L_new_attr("br_pad", 1);
02018         L_set_int_attr_field(attr, 0, pad_value);
02019         oper->attr = L_concat_attr(oper->attr, attr);
02020     }
02021 }
02022 
02023 
02024 int Lsched_cb_completion_time(L_Cb *cb)
02025 {
02026     if (!cb->last_op) return 0;
02027 
02028     if (IS_IGNORE(cb->last_op->proc_opc)) return 0;
02029 
02030     return (SCHED_INFO(cb->last_op)->issue_time + 1);
02031 }
02032 
02033 int Lsched_need_pad(L_Cb *target, L_Oper *oper, int overextend)
02034 {
02035     L_Oper      *cur_oper;
02036     int         src, dest;
02037 
02038     if (overextend <= 0) return 0;
02039 
02040     for (cur_oper = target->first_op; cur_oper != NULL; 
02041          cur_oper = cur_oper->next_op)
02042     {
02043         if (IS_IGNORE(cur_oper->proc_opc)) continue;
02044 
02045         if (SCHED_INFO(cur_oper)->issue_time >= overextend) return 0;
02046 
02047         /* 
02048          * If any of the dest operands match a source operand, then
02049          * we have an interlock condition and must pad with nops.
02050          */
02051         for (dest=0; dest<L_max_dest_operand; dest++)
02052             for (src=0; src<L_max_src_operand; src++)
02053                 if ((oper->dest[dest]!=NULL) &&
02054                      L_same_operand(oper->dest[dest], cur_oper->src[src]))
02055                     return 1;
02056     }
02057 
02058     return 0;
02059 }
02060 
02061 static void Lsched_determine_pad_for_vliw(L_Cb *cb)
02062 {
02063     L_Cb        *target_cb, *fall_thru_cb;
02064     L_Oper      *oper, *dep_oper;
02065     L_Dep       *dep;
02066     int         br_pad, cb_pad, overextend, cb_overextend, max_cb_overextend,
02067                 cb_completion_time; 
02068 
02069     fall_thru_cb = L_fall_thru_path(cb);
02070     cb_completion_time = Lsched_cb_completion_time(cb);
02071     max_cb_overextend = 0;
02072 
02073     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
02074     {
02075         if (IS_IGNORE(oper->proc_opc)) continue;
02076 
02077         if (L_cond_branch_opcode(oper))
02078         {
02079             br_pad = Lsched_get_br_pad_value(oper);
02080 
02081             target_cb = oper->src[2]->value.cb;
02082             cb_pad = Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(target_cb);
02083 
02084             for (dep = DEP_INFO(oper)->input_dep; dep != 0; dep=dep->next_dep)
02085             {
02086                 dep_oper = dep->from_oper;
02087 
02088                 if (IS_IGNORE(dep_oper->proc_opc)) continue;
02089 
02090                 overextend = Lsched_completion_time(dep_oper) - 
02091                     Lsched_completion_time(oper);
02092 
02093                 if (overextend < 0) overextend = 0;
02094 
02095                 if ((overextend != 0) && 
02096                     (Lsched_need_pad(target_cb, oper, overextend)))
02097                     continue;
02098 
02099                 if (overextend > br_pad)
02100                     Lsched_create_br_pad(oper, overextend);
02101 
02102                 if (overextend < cb_pad)
02103                     Lsched_create_cb_start_pad(target_cb, overextend);
02104             }
02105         }
02106         else if (L_uncond_branch_opcode(oper))
02107         {
02108             br_pad = Lsched_get_br_pad_value(oper);
02109 
02110             target_cb = oper->src[0]->value.cb;
02111             cb_pad = Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(target_cb);
02112 
02113             for (dep = DEP_INFO(oper)->input_dep; dep != 0; dep=dep->next_dep)
02114             {
02115                 dep_oper = dep->from_oper;
02116 
02117                 if (IS_IGNORE(dep_oper->proc_opc)) continue;
02118 
02119                 overextend = Lsched_completion_time(dep_oper) - 
02120                     Lsched_completion_time(oper);
02121 
02122                 if (overextend < 0) overextend = 0;
02123 
02124                 if ((overextend != 0) && 
02125                     (Lsched_need_pad(target_cb, oper, overextend)))
02126                     continue;
02127 
02128                 if (overextend > br_pad)
02129                     Lsched_create_br_pad(oper, overextend);
02130 
02131                 if (overextend < cb_pad)
02132                     Lsched_create_cb_start_pad(target_cb, overextend);
02133             }
02134         }
02135 
02136         cb_overextend = Lsched_completion_time(oper) - cb_completion_time;
02137 
02138         if (fall_thru_cb && (cb_overextend > max_cb_overextend) && 
02139             Lsched_need_pad(fall_thru_cb, oper, cb_overextend))
02140         {
02141             max_cb_overextend = cb_overextend;
02142         }
02143     }
02144 
02145     if (fall_thru_cb)
02146     {
02147         cb_pad = Lsched_get_cb_end_pad_value(fall_thru_cb);
02148         if (max_cb_overextend > cb_pad)
02149             Lsched_create_cb_end_pad(cb, max_cb_overextend);
02150 
02151         cb_pad = Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(fall_thru_cb);
02152         if (max_cb_overextend < cb_pad)
02153             Lsched_create_cb_start_pad(fall_thru_cb, max_cb_overextend);
02154     }
02155 }
02156 
02157 static void Lsched_pad_cycles_start_of_cb_for_vliw(L_Cb *cb)
02158 {
02159     L_Oper      *oper;
02160     int         cb_pad, issue_time;
02161 
02162     cb_pad=Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(cb);
02163 
02164     if ((cb_pad == 0) || (cb_pad == NO_CB_PAD)) return;
02165 
02166     /* Delay the issue and completion time for all instructions */
02167     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
02168     {
02169         if (!IS_IGNORE(oper->proc_opc))
02170         {
02171             SCHED_INFO(oper)->issue_time+=cb_pad;
02172 #if 0
02173 BLD 6/95
02174             SCHED_INFO(oper)->completion_time+=cb_pad;
02175 #endif
02176         }
02177     }
02178 
02179     /* Now add the padded number of no-op cycles to beginning of cb */
02180     for (issue_time=0; issue_time < cb_pad; issue_time++)
02181     {
02182         L_insert_oper_before(cb, cb->first_op, 
02183             Lsched_create_nop(issue_time, 0));
02184     }
02185 }
02186 
02187 static void Lsched_pad_cycles_end_of_cb_for_vliw(L_Cb *cb)
02188 {
02189     L_Cb        *fall_thru_cb;
02190     int         end_pad, start_pad, issue_time, last_time; 
02191 
02192     end_pad=Lsched_get_cb_end_pad_value(cb);
02193 
02194     if (end_pad <= 0) return;
02195 
02196     fall_thru_cb = L_fall_thru_path(cb);
02197 
02198     start_pad = Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(fall_thru_cb);
02199 
02200     end_pad -= start_pad;
02201 
02202     if (end_pad <= 0) return;
02203 
02204     if ((cb->last_op) && (!IS_IGNORE(cb->last_op->proc_opc)))
02205         last_time = SCHED_INFO(cb->last_op)->issue_time+1;
02206     else
02207         last_time = 0;
02208 
02209     /* Now add the padded number of no-op cycles to beginning of cb */
02210     for (issue_time=last_time; issue_time < last_time + end_pad; issue_time++)
02211     {
02212         L_insert_oper_after(cb, cb->last_op, 
02213             Lsched_create_nop(issue_time, 0));
02214     }
02215 }
02216 
02217 static void Lsched_pad_cycles_for_vliw(L_Func *fn, L_Cb *cb)
02218 {
02219     L_Cb        *target_cb, *new_cb;
02220     L_Oper      *oper, *new_oper;
02221     L_Operand   *target;
02222     L_Flow      *dest_flow, *new_flow, *src_flow;
02223     int         i, br_pad, cb_pad, issue_time; 
02224 
02225     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
02226     {
02227         if ((L_cond_branch_opcode(oper)) && 
02228             (br_pad = Lsched_get_br_pad_value(oper))!=0)
02229         {
02230             target_cb = oper->src[2]->value.cb;
02231             cb_pad = Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(target_cb);
02232 
02233             if (cb_pad == br_pad) continue;
02234 
02235             /* Correct/add the flow arcs to point to the new cb and back */
02236             dest_flow = L_find_flow_for_branch(cb, oper);
02237             src_flow = L_find_flow(target_cb->src_flow,
