02238                 dest_flow->cc, dest_flow->src_cb, dest_flow->dst_cb);
02239 
02240             /* Create a new cb */
02241             new_cb = L_create_cb (dest_flow->weight);
02242 
02243             dest_flow->dst_cb = new_cb;
02244 
02245             new_flow = L_new_flow(dest_flow->cc, cb, new_cb,
02246                 dest_flow->weight);
02247             new_cb->src_flow = L_concat_flow(new_cb->src_flow, 
02248                 new_flow);
02249 
02250 
02251             /* 
02252              * Correct/add the flow arcs to point from new cb to target 
02253              * and back.
02254              */
02255             new_flow = L_new_flow(1.0, new_cb, target_cb, dest_flow->weight);
02256             new_cb->dest_flow = L_concat_flow(new_cb->dest_flow, 
02257                 new_flow);
02258 
02259             src_flow->src_cb = new_cb;
02260             src_flow->cc = 1.0;
02261 
02262 
02263             target = oper->src[2];
02264             oper->src[2] = L_new_cb_operand(new_cb);
02265             L_insert_cb_after(fn, fn->last_cb, new_cb);
02266 
02267             /* Create a jump to the original target cb */
02268             br_pad = br_pad - cb_pad - 1;
02269             new_oper = Lsched_create_jump(br_pad, 0, target);
02270             L_delete_operand(target);
02271             L_insert_oper_before(new_cb, new_cb->first_op, new_oper);
02272 
02273             /* Add the remaining pad cycles */
02274             for (issue_time=0; issue_time<br_pad; issue_time++)
02275                 L_insert_oper_before(new_cb, new_cb->first_op, 
02276                     Lsched_create_nop(issue_time, 0));
02277         }
02278         else if ((L_uncond_branch_opcode(oper)) && 
02279             (br_pad = Lsched_get_br_pad_value(oper))!=0)
02280         {
02281             target_cb = oper->src[0]->value.cb;
02282             cb_pad = Lsched_get_cb_start_pad_value(target_cb);
02283 
02284             if (cb_pad == br_pad) continue;
02285 
02286             /* 
02287              * Delay the initiation and completion time of the
02288              * jump to br_pad - cb_pad cycles later.
02289              */
02290             issue_time = SCHED_INFO(oper)->issue_time;
02291             br_pad -= cb_pad;
02292             SCHED_INFO(oper)->issue_time += br_pad;
02293 #if 0
02294 BLD 6/95
02295             SCHED_INFO(oper)->completion_time += br_pad;
02296 #endif
02297 
02298             /* Add the remaining pad cycles */
02299             if (((oper->prev_op) && 
02300                  (SCHED_INFO(oper->prev_op)->issue_time == issue_time)) ||
02301                 ((oper->next_op) &&
02302                  (SCHED_INFO(oper->next_op)->issue_time == issue_time)))
02303                 issue_time++;
02304 
02305             for (i = issue_time+1; i<issue_time + br_pad; i++)
02306                 L_insert_oper_before(cb, oper, Lsched_create_nop(i, 0));
02307         }
02308     }
02309 }
02310 
02311 static void Lsched_correct_schedule_for_vliw(L_Func *fn)
02312 {
02313     L_Cb        *cb;
02314 
02315     if ((M_arch != M_HPPA) && (M_arch != M_IMPACT) && (M_arch != M_PLAYDOH))
02316         L_punt ("VLIW correction only supported for Lhppa, Limpact, or Lplaydoh.");
02317     /* 
02318      * Determine the number of cycles that must be padded to ensure correct
02319      * execution.
02320      */
02321     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
02322     {
02323         Lsched_determine_pad_for_vliw(cb);
02324     }
02325 
02326     /* 
02327      * First we will pad the the beginning and end of any cb's to minimize
02328      * the number of cycles padded.
02329      */
02330     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
02331     {
02332         Lsched_pad_cycles_start_of_cb_for_vliw(cb);
02333         Lsched_pad_cycles_end_of_cb_for_vliw(cb);
02334     }
02335 
02336     /* 
02337      * Pad the CBs with no-op cycles to ensure correct operation without
02338      * interlocking hardware.
02339      */
02340     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
02341     {
02342         Lsched_pad_cycles_for_vliw(fn, cb);
02343     }
02344 
02345     /* 
02346      * Padding cbs with no-ops can create new cbs which will invalidate
02347      * the existing dataflow.  
02348      */
02349     if (Lsched_print_statistics)
02350         L_do_pred_flow_analysis(fn, LIVE_VARIABLE);
02351 
02352     /*
02353      * Assuming simplistic VLIW model, we will pad any unfilled slots
02354      * with no-ops.
02355      */
02356     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
02357     {
02358         Lsched_pad_slots_with_nops(cb);
02359     }
02360 }
02361 
02362 
02363 
02364 /******************************************************************************\
02365  *
02366  *
02367  *
02368 \******************************************************************************/
02369 
02370 void Lsched_add_isl_attr (L_Func *fn)
02371 {
02372   int i, dest_count;
02373   L_Oper *oper;
02374   L_Cb *cb;
02375   Sched_Info *sinfo;
02376   L_Attr *attr;
02377 
02378   for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb; cb = cb->next_cb)
02379     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op)
02380       if (oper->ext) {
02381         sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
02382         attr = L_find_attr(oper->attr, "isl");
02383         if (attr != NULL)  /* delete the old isl attr */
02384           oper->attr = L_delete_attr(oper->attr, attr);
02385 
02386         dest_count = 0;
02387         for(i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
02388           {
02389             if (oper->dest[i] != NULL)
02390               dest_count = i + 1;
02391           }
02392 
02393         attr = L_new_attr("isl", 2 + dest_count);
02394         
02395         for (i = 0; i < dest_count; i++ )
02396           {
02397             if (oper->dest[i] != NULL) {
02398               L_set_int_attr_field(attr, i+2, 
02399                                    sinfo->relative_latency[i]);
02400             }
02401           }
02402 
02403         L_set_int_attr_field (attr, 0 , sinfo->issue_time);
02404         L_set_int_attr_field (attr, 1, sinfo->issue_slot);
02405         oper->attr = L_concat_attr (oper->attr, attr);
02406       }
02407 }
02408 
02409 void Lsched_delete_isl_attr (L_Func *fn)
02410 {
02411   L_Oper *oper;
02412   L_Cb   *cb;
02413   L_Attr *attr;
02414 
02415   for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb; cb = cb->next_cb)
02416     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op)
02417       if (oper->ext) {
02418         attr = L_find_attr (oper->attr, "isl");
02419         if (!attr)
02420           L_punt ("ERROR: isl attribute expected, but not found!!!!!");
02421         oper->attr = L_delete_attr (oper->attr, attr);
02422       }
02423 }
02424 
02425 void Lsched_fix_flows (L_Cb *cb)
02426 /* Reorders flows so they match the order of branches.  With predication, 
02427  * branch order can change */
02428 {
02429     L_Oper      *oper;
02430     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
02431     L_Flow      **flow_ptrs, *flow, *next_flow;
02432     int         flow_count, index, branch_count;
02433     L_Cb        *target_cb;
02434 
02435     /* only execture the remainder of this function if flows exist which can
02436      * be reordered. */
02437     if (!cb->dest_flow) return;
02438 
02439     /* keep tabs of all flow pointers so that their order can be easily
02440      * manipulated. */
02441     flow_count = 0;
02442     for (flow = cb->dest_flow; flow; flow = flow->next_flow)
02443         flow_count++;
02444 
02445     flow_ptrs = (L_Flow **) malloc (flow_count * sizeof (L_Flow *));
02446 
02447     index = 0;
02448     for (flow = cb->dest_flow; flow; flow = next_flow) {
02449         next_flow = flow->next_flow;
02450         flow_ptrs[index++] = flow;
02451         flow->next_flow = NULL;
02452         flow->prev_flow = NULL;
02453     }
02454 
02455     /* change the actual order of the outgoing flows */
02456     cb->dest_flow = NULL;
02457     branch_count = 0;
02458     for (oper = cb->first_op; oper; oper = oper->next_op) {
02459         if (L_general_branch_opcode (oper)) {
02460             branch_count++;
02461             sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
02462             cb->dest_flow = L_concat_flow (cb->dest_flow, 
02463                                            flow_ptrs[sinfo->orig_block]);
02464             if (!L_register_branch_opcode(oper)) {
02465                 target_cb = L_find_branch_dest (oper);
02466                 if (target_cb != flow_ptrs[sinfo->orig_block]->dst_cb)
02467                     L_punt ("ERROR: branch target cb doesn't match flow target");
02468             }
02469         }
02470     }
02471 
02472     if ((branch_count + 1) == flow_count) /* take care of fall-thru */
02473         cb->dest_flow = L_concat_flow (cb->dest_flow,
02474                                        flow_ptrs[flow_count - 1]);
02475     else if (L_register_branch_opcode(cb->last_op)) { /* take care of jump rg */
02476         for (index = branch_count; index < flow_count; index++)
02477             cb->dest_flow = L_concat_flow (cb->dest_flow, flow_ptrs[index]);
02478     }
02479     else if ((branch_count > flow_count) || ((branch_count + 1) < flow_count))
02480         L_punt ("ERROR: comparison error between flow_count and branch_count");
02481 
02482     free (flow_ptrs);
02483 }
02484 
02485 void Lsched_schedule_block(cb)
02486     L_Cb        *cb;
02487 {
02488     int         current_block=0, issue_slot, spec, work, 
02489                 silent, num_exits;
02490     L_Oper      *oper, *next_op, **exit_ops;
02491     Sched_Info  *sinfo;
02492 
02493     if (Lsched_num_opers==0) return;
02494 
02495     /* Calculate early and late times, and then calculate the priority function
02496      * from these values.  This is used in place of 
02497      * Lsched_compute_static_priorities. */
02498     Lsched_init_etimes_and_ltimes (cb);
02499     num_exits = Lsched_determine_etimes (cb, &exit_ops);
02500     Lsched_determine_ltimes (cb, num_exits, exit_ops);
02501     Lsched_calculate_priority_normal (cb, num_exits, exit_ops);
02502     free (exit_ops);
02503 
02504     /* Perform initialization for dynamic scheduling heuristic */
02505     if (Lsched_regpres_heuristic) Lregpres_init_cb (cb);
02506 
02507     /* Initialize the RU manager */
02508     RU_map_init(RU_MODE_ACYCLIC, 0);
02509 
02510     /*
02511      * Place the operations into the either the pending_ready queue or 
02512      * the not_ready queue based upon dependences.
02513      */
02514     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=next_op)
02515     {
02516         next_op = oper->next_op;
02517 
02518         /* We only schedule instructions that are not to be ignored */
02519         if (oper->ext!=NULL)
02520         {
02521             sinfo = SCHED_INFO(oper);
02522 
02523             if ( (Lsched_fill_delay_slots) &&
02524                  (Lsched_handle_spilled_branch(cb, sinfo)) )
02525                     next_op = oper->next_op;
02526 
02527             L_remove_oper(cb, oper);
02528 
02529             if (sinfo->num_depend==0)
02530             {
02531                 sinfo->ready_time = sinfo->dep_info->level;
02532                 L_enqueue_min_to_max_1 (pending_ready_queue,
02533                     sinfo, (float) sinfo->ready_time);
02534             }
02535             else
02536             {
02537                 L_enqueue(not_ready_queue, sinfo);
02538             }
02539         }
02540     }
02541 
02542     /* Perform initial seeding for branch delay slots */
02543     if (Lsched_fill_delay_slots)
02544         Lsched_check_for_fill_candidates(pending_ready_queue);
02545 
02546     /*
02547      * The following outlines the steps followed during prepass list scheduling
02548      * each cycle.
02549      *
02550      * 1) Attempt to schedule all instructions from the priority ready queue.
02551      *    skip over those that can't be scheduled.  Every time an instruction
02552      *    is aged into the priority ready queue prior to the last entry that
02553      *    had been attempted to be scheduled, the current entry is set to 
02554      *    the new entry.
02555      *
02556      * 2) Reset the current entry to the head of the queue.
02557      *
02558      * 3) If the priority ready queue is not empty, we are not able to schedule any 
02559      *    more instructions at the current cycle, therefore we will increment the 
02560      *    timer by one tick.
02561      *
02562      *    If the queue is empty, there are no more instructions to schedule.  We
02563      *    increment the timer to the time of the earliest instruction in the pending
02564      *    ready queue.
02565      *
02566      * 4) We will move all instructions that can be scheduled at the current time
02567      *    from the pending ready queue to the priority ready queue.
02568      */
02569     L_init_ready_queue();
02570 
02571     work = L_get_queue_size(pending_ready_queue);
02572 
02573     while (work)
02574     {
02575         if (current_time > 50000)
02576             L_punt ("Lsched_schedule_block:  Infinite loop ?\n");
02577 
02578 
02579         /* 1) Attempt to schedule all instructions in the ready list */
02580         while ((sinfo = L_get_next_entry())!=NULL)
02581         {
02582             /* Determine if it is legal to schedule this instruction */
02583             if (Lsched_can_schedule_op(cb, sinfo, current_time, current_block, 
02584                   &issue_slot, &spec, &silent) == CAN_SCHEDULE)
02585             {
02586                 /* Allocate the processor resources for this operation */
02587                 RU_schedule_op_at(sinfo->ru_info, sinfo->mdes_info,
02588                     sinfo->operand_ready_times,
02589                     current_time, issue_slot, silent);
02590 
02591                 sinfo->issue_slot = issue_slot;
02592                 sinfo->current_block = current_block;
02593 
02594                 if (Lsched_fill_delay_slots)
02595                     Lsched_schedule_with_delay_op(cb, sinfo, current_time,
02596                         current_block, issue_slot, spec);
02597                 else
02598                     Lsched_schedule_op(cb, sinfo, spec, current_time);
02599 
02600                 if (Lsched_is_branch(sinfo->proc_opc))
02601                     current_block=sinfo->home_block+1;
02602 
02603                 /* Age instructions from the pending ready queue.  */
02604                 while (L_get_queue_size(pending_ready_queue))
02605                 {
02606                     sinfo = L_get_queue_head(pending_ready_queue);
02607                     if (sinfo->ready_time <= current_time)
02608                     {
02609                         L_dequeue(pending_ready_queue, sinfo);
02610                         L_insert_entry (sinfo);
02611                     }
02612                     else
02613                         break;
02614                 }
02615             }
02616         }
02617 
02618 
02619         /* 2) Reset to the first entry in the queue */
02620         L_init_ready_queue();
02621 
02622 
02623         /* 3) Update the scheduling timer. */
02624         if (L_get_queue_size(priority_ready_queue))
02625             current_time++;
02626         else
02627             if (L_get_queue_size(pending_ready_queue))
02628                 current_time = L_get_queue_head(pending_ready_queue)->ready_time;
02629 
02630         if (Lsched_infinite_issue) Lsched_infinite_issue_slot=0;
02631 
02632         /* 4) Age instructions from the pending_ready list to the ready list.  */
02633         while (L_get_queue_size(pending_ready_queue))
02634         {
02635             sinfo = L_get_queue_head(pending_ready_queue);
02636             if (sinfo->ready_time <= current_time)
02637             {
02638                 L_dequeue(pending_ready_queue, sinfo);
02639                 L_insert_entry (sinfo);
02640             }
02641             else
02642                 break;
02643         }
02644 
02645         /* If we still have no instructions in either list, we are done. */
02646         work = L_get_queue_size(priority_ready_queue);
02647     }
02648 
02649     /* Add any scheduled instructions back to the end of the control block.  */
02650     while (L_get_queue_size(scheduled_queue))
02651     {
02652         sinfo = L_get_queue_head(scheduled_queue);
02653         L_dequeue(scheduled_queue, sinfo);
02654 
02655         if (L_subroutine_return_opcode (sinfo->oper)) {
02656             int epilogue_found = FALSE;
02657             for (oper = cb->first_op; oper && !epilogue_found;
02658                  oper = oper->next_op)
02659                 if (L_is_opcode (Lop_EPILOGUE, oper)) {
02660                     epilogue_found = TRUE;
02661                     L_remove_oper (cb, oper);
02662                     L_insert_oper_after (cb, cb->last_op, oper);
02663                 }
02664         }
02665 
02666         L_insert_oper_after(cb, cb->last_op, sinfo->oper);
02667     }
02668 
02669     /*
02670      * If we reached this point and the not_ready list has any operations still
02671      * in it, we have a bug!  Print out the appropriate error message and state.
02672      */
02673     if (L_get_queue_size(not_ready_queue))
02674     {
02675         fprintf (stdout, "Lsched_schedule_block: scheduled opers, current_time=%d!\n",
02676             current_time);
02677         L_print_cb (stdout, NULL, cb);
02678         L_punt("Lsched_schedule_block: not_ready_queue is not empty!\n");
02679     }
02680 
02681     /* In order to support FRP, check to see if any branches were reordered.
02682      * If branch reordering occurred, fix the corresponding flows. */
02683     Lsched_fix_flows (cb);
02684 }
02685 
02686 /******************************************************************************\
02687  *
02688  * Main entry points for prepass and post pass code scheduling
02689  *
02690 \******************************************************************************/
02691 
02692 void Lsched_prepass_code_scheduling(fn) 
02693 L_Func *fn;
02694 {
02695     L_Cb        *cb, *old_cb = NULL;
02696     L_Oper      *oper, *prev_br, *post_br;
02697     int         home_block, is_branch;
02698     int         mcb_orig_cb_maxid, mcb_already_redone_flow = 0;
02699 
02700     Lsched_prepass = 1;
02701 
02702     Lsched_debug_messages = Lsched_debug_prepass_scheduling;
02703 
02704     if (Lsched_debug_messages)
02705         fprintf (stdout, "prepass scheduling: %s\n", fn->name);
02706 
02707     /* We do not fill delay slots during prepass at all */
02708     Lsched_fill_delay_slots=0;
02709 
02710     /* Perform dataflow analysis. */
02711     L_do_flow_analysis(fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | DOMINATOR_CB);
02712 
02713     if (Lsched_static_fall_thru_weight > 0)
02714     {
02715         L_compute_static_cb_weight(fn);
02716         L_compute_oper_weight(fn, Lsched_static_fall_thru_weight, 0);
02717     }
02718     else
02719         L_compute_oper_weight(fn, 0, 1);
02720 
02721     Ldep_mark_safe(fn);
02722 
02723     /* Perform function level initialization for register pressure heuristic */
02724     Lregpres_init_func(fn);
02725 
02726 #if 0
02727     /* breakup self anti dep instrs if doing sentinel scheudling */
02728     if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB) 
02729         L_sentinel_anti_dep_breakup(fn);
02730 #endif
02731 
02732     mcb_orig_cb_maxid = fn->max_cb_id;
02733 
02734     /* Main scheduling loop */
02735     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb!=NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
02736     {
02737         /* To aid debugging the scheduler and/or the dependence graph,
02738          * allow the cbs scheduled to be limited by putting a bound
02739          * on the cb id's that allowed to be scheduled. -JCG 5/4/95
02740          */
02741         if ((Lsched_debug_use_sched_cb_bounds) &&
02742             ((cb->id > Lsched_debug_upper_sched_cb_bound) ||
02743              (cb->id < Lsched_debug_lower_sched_cb_bound)))
02744             continue;
02745 
02746 
02747         if (L_spec_model==MCB) {
02748             if (cb->id > mcb_orig_cb_maxid && (! mcb_already_redone_flow)) {
02749                 L_do_pred_flow_analysis(fn, LIVE_VARIABLE);
02750                 mcb_already_redone_flow = 1;
02751             }
02752         }
02753 
02754         if ( (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE)) &&
02755               L_do_software_pipelining )
02756             continue;
02757 
02758         if ( Lsched_debug_messages )
02759             fprintf(stdout, "prepass scheduling cb %d\n", cb->id);
02760 
02761         if ((cb->last_op) && IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc) &&
02762             (!L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) || L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
02763                                                 L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))
02764             Lsched_latest_br = cb->last_op;
02765         else
02766             Lsched_latest_br = NULL;
02767 
02768         /* Build MDES information */
02769         L_build_cb_mdes_info (cb);
02770 
02771         /*  Build dependence graph */
02772         L_build_dependence_graph(cb, LDEP_PREPASS, LDEP_MODE_ACYCLIC);
02773 
02774         /* Initialize branch ptrs */
02775         prev_br = NULL;
02776         post_br = L_find_next_branch(cb, NULL);
02777 
02778         /* Build Scheduler information */
02779         Lsched_num_opers = 0;
02780         for (oper=cb->first_op, home_block=0; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op)
02781         {
02782             is_branch = Lsched_is_branch(oper->proc_opc);
02783 
02784             if (is_branch)
02785                 post_br = L_find_next_branch(cb, oper);
02786 
02787             if (!IS_IGNORE(oper->proc_opc))
02788             {
02789                 Lsched_num_opers++;
02790                 oper->ext = (Sched_Info *) 
02791                     L_create_sched_info(oper, home_block, prev_br, post_br);
02792             }
02793 
02794             if (is_branch)
02795             {
02796                 home_block++;
02797                 prev_br = oper;
02798             }
02799         }
02800 
02801         /* 
02802          * Insert check operations for WBS/Sentinel scheduling
02803          */
02804         if (L_spec_model==WRITEBACK_SUPPRESSION)
02805             wbs_insert_check(cb);
02806 #if 0
02807         else if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
02808             L_sentinel_insert_check(cb);
02809 #endif
02810 
02811 #if 0
02812         /* setup code for sentinel scheduling */
02813         if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
02814           L_sentinel_init_update_block();
02815 #endif
02816 
02817         if (L_spec_model==MCB)
02818             old_cb = L_copy_all_oper_in_cb (fn, cb);
02819 
02820         /* Code scheduling */
02821         Lsched_schedule_block(cb);
02822 
02823 #if 0
02824         /* SAM 11-94, Reorder flow arcs if branches reordered */
02825         if (L_dest_flow_out_of_order(cb))
02826             L_reorder_dest_flows(cb);
02827 #endif
02828 
02829         /* 
02830          * Extend live ranges to control register pressure
02831          */
02832         switch (L_spec_model)
02833         {
02834             case WRITEBACK_SUPPRESSION:
02835                 wbs_extend_live_range(cb);
02836                 break;
02837         
02838 #if 0
02839             case SENTINEL:
02840             case SRB:
02841                 L_sentinel_extend_live_range(cb);
02842 #endif
02843             
02844         }
02845 
02846         if (L_spec_model == MCB)
02847             Lsched_mcb_schedule_block(fn,old_cb,cb);
02848 
02849 #if 0
02850         L_print_sched_info(stdout, cb);
02851         L_print_dependence_graph(stdout, cb);
02852 #endif
02853 
02854         if (!L_do_postpass_sched) L_annotate_instr(cb);
02855 
02856 #if 0
02857         /* reset code for sentinel scheduling */
02858         if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
02859             L_sentinel_deinit_update_block();
02860 #endif
02861 
02862         L_delete_dependence_graph(cb);
02863 
02864         /* Delete MDES information */
02865         L_free_cb_mdes_info (cb);
02866 
02867     }
02868 
02869     Lsched_add_isl_attr(fn);
02870     /* Free up any memory allocated for the function */
02871     if (!L_do_postpass_sched)
02872     {
02873         /* Print out the schedule */
02874         if ( Lsched_print_statistics )
02875             L_print_schedule(EXTERN_LOG_FILE, fn);
02876 
02877         if (!L_do_register_allocation)
02878             Lsched_func_complete(fn);
02879     }
02880 
02881     if ( Lsched_print_prepass_statistics )
02882         L_print_schedule(EXTERN_LOG_FILE_PREPASS, fn);
02883 
02884     /* Perform cleanup for register pressure heuristic */
02885     Lregpres_deinit_func(fn);
02886 }
02887 
02888 void Lsched_postpass_code_scheduling(fn) 
02889 L_Func *fn;
02890 {
02891     L_Cb        *cb; 
02892     L_Oper      *oper, *prev_br, *post_br;
02893     int         home_block, is_branch;
02894     int         MCB_old_upward = 0, MCB_old_downward = 0;
02895 
02896     Lsched_prepass = 0;
02897     Lsched_num_opers=0;
02898 
02899     Lsched_debug_messages=Lsched_debug_postpass_scheduling;
02900 
02901 #if 0
02902     if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
02903     {
02904         Ldep_allow_upward_code_perc = 0;
02905         Ldep_allow_downward_code_perc = 0;
02906     }
02907 #endif
02908 
02909     if (L_spec_model == MCB) 
02910     {
02911         MCB_old_upward = Ldep_allow_upward_code_perc;
02912         MCB_old_downward = Ldep_allow_downward_code_perc;
02913         Ldep_allow_upward_code_perc = 0;
02914         Ldep_allow_downward_code_perc = 0;
02915     }
02916 
02917     if (Lsched_debug_messages)
02918         fprintf (stdout, "postpass scheduling: %s\n", fn->name);
02919 
02920     L_clear_all_reserved_oper_flags(fn);
02921 
02922     /* Determine if we are to attempt to fill non-squashing delay slots */
02923     Lsched_fill_delay_slots=Lsched_do_fill_nonsquashing_branches;
02924 
02925 
02926 #if 0
02927     /* 
02928      * Perform dataflow analysis.   This information may not exist
02929      * if prepass scheduling is not performed.  If register allocation
02930      * was performed, the information is corrupted and must be redone.
02931      */
02932     if ((!L_do_prepass_sched) || L_do_register_allocation)
02933     {
02934         L_do_pred_flow_analysis(fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | DOMINATOR_CB);
02935 
02936         if (Lsched_static_fall_thru_weight > 0)
02937         {
02938             L_compute_static_cb_weight(fn);
02939             L_compute_oper_weight(fn, Lsched_static_fall_thru_weight, 0);
02940         }
02941         else
02942             L_compute_oper_weight(fn, 0, 1);
02943     }
02944 
02945     if (!L_do_prepass_sched)
02946         Ldep_mark_safe(fn);
02947 
02948 #endif
02949     if (Lsched_do_postpass_scheduling)
02950     {
02951         /* 
02952          * Perform dataflow analysis.  This is always performed, which wasn't
02953          * true in the past.
02954          */
02955         L_do_pred_flow_analysis(fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | DOMINATOR_CB);
02956         
02957         if (Lsched_static_fall_thru_weight > 0)
02958         {
02959             L_compute_static_cb_weight(fn);
02960             L_compute_oper_weight(fn, Lsched_static_fall_thru_weight, 0);
02961         }
02962         else
02963             L_compute_oper_weight(fn, 0, 1);
02964         
02965         if (!L_do_prepass_sched)
02966             Ldep_mark_safe(fn);
02967 
02968         for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb!=NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
02969         {
02970             /* To aid debugging the scheduler and/or the dependence graph,
02971              * allow the cbs scheduled to be limited by putting a bound
02972              * on the cb id's that allowed to be scheduled. -JCG 5/4/95
02973              */
02974             if ((Lsched_debug_use_sched_cb_bounds) &&
02975                 ((cb->id > Lsched_debug_upper_sched_cb_bound) ||
02976                  (cb->id < Lsched_debug_lower_sched_cb_bound)))
02977                 continue;
02978 
02979             if ( (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE)) &&
02980                   L_do_software_pipelining )
02981                 continue;
02982 
02983             if ( Lsched_debug_messages )
02984                 fprintf(stdout, "postpass scheduling cb %d\n", cb->id);
02985 
02986             if ((cb->last_op) && IS_UCOND_BRANCH(cb->last_op->proc_opc) &&
02987                 (!L_is_predicated(cb->last_op) || L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL(cb->flags,
02988                                                 L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU)))
02989                 Lsched_latest_br = cb->last_op;
02990             else
02991                 Lsched_latest_br = NULL;
02992 
02993             /* Build MDES information */
02994             L_build_cb_mdes_info (cb);
02995 
02996             /*  Build dependence graph */
02997             L_build_dependence_graph(cb, LDEP_POSTPASS, LDEP_MODE_ACYCLIC);
02998 
02999             /* Initialize branch ptrs */
03000             prev_br = NULL;
03001             post_br = L_find_next_branch(cb, NULL);
03002 
03003             /* 
03004              * Build Scheduler information 
03005              *
03006              * Note:  We don't build scheduler information for
03007              * opcodes which are not real instructions
03008              */
03009             Lsched_num_opers = 0;
03010             for (oper=cb->first_op, home_block=0; oper!=NULL; 
03011                 oper=oper->next_op)
03012 
03013             {
03014                 is_branch = Lsched_is_branch(oper->proc_opc);
03015 
03016                 if (is_branch)
03017                     post_br = L_find_next_branch(cb, oper);
03018 
03019                 if ((oper->ext==NULL) && !IS_IGNORE(oper->proc_opc))
03020                 {
03021                     Lsched_num_opers++;
03022                     oper->ext = (Sched_Info *) 
03023                         L_create_sched_info(oper, home_block, prev_br, post_br);
03024                 }
03025                 else if (oper->ext!=NULL)
03026                 {
03027                     Lsched_num_opers++;
03028                     L_update_sched_info(SCHED_INFO(oper), oper, home_block);
03029                 }
03030                     
03031                 if (is_branch)
03032                 {
03033                     home_block++;
03034                     prev_br = oper;
03035                 }
03036             }
03037 
03038             /* 
03039              * Insert check operations for WBS scheduling
03040              */
03041             if (L_spec_model==WRITEBACK_SUPPRESSION)
03042                 wbs_insert_check(cb);
03043 #if 0
03044             else if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
03045             {
03046                 L_sentinel_insert_check(cb);
03047                 L_sentinel_preserve_interval(cb);
03048             }
03049 #endif
03050 
03051 #if 0
03052             /* setup code for sentinel scheduling */
03053             if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
03054                 L_sentinel_init_update_block();
03055 #endif
03056 
03057             /* Code scheduling */
03058             Lsched_schedule_block(cb);
03059 
03060             /* SAM 11-94, Reorder flow arcs if branches reordered */
03061             if (L_dest_flow_out_of_order(cb))
03062                 L_reorder_dest_flows(cb);
03063 
03064             /* Append scheduler information to instrutions */ 
03065             L_annotate_instr(cb);
03066 
03067 #if 0
03068             /* reset code for sentinel scheduling */
03069             if ((L_spec_model == SENTINEL) || (L_spec_model == SRB))
03070                 L_sentinel_deinit_update_block();
03071 #endif
03072         }
03073     }
03074 
03075     if (Lsched_processor_model == MDES_VLIW)
03076     {
03077         /* VLIW will not support delay slot filling at this time */
03078         if (Lsched_do_fill_nonsquashing_branches ||
03079             Lsched_do_fill_squashing_branches ||
03080             Lsched_do_fill_unfilled_branches)
03081             L_warn("Filling of branch delay slots not supported for VLIW - ignored!");
03082         if (!Lsched_do_postpass_scheduling && !L_do_prepass_sched)
03083             L_punt("Can't correct vliw schedule if code is not scheduled!");
03084 
03085         if (! Lsched_vliw_has_interlocking)
03086             Lsched_correct_schedule_for_vliw(fn);
03087     }
03088     else
03089     {
03090         /* Handle nonsquashing branches */
03091         if (Lsched_do_fill_nonsquashing_branches)
03092             Lsched_fill_nonsquashing_branches(fn);
03093 
03094         /* Handle squashing branches */
03095         if (Lsched_do_fill_squashing_branches)
03096             Lsched_fill_squashing_branches(fn);
03097 
03098         /* Fill any unfilled branch slots */
03099         if (Lsched_do_fill_unfilled_branches)
03100             Lsched_fill_unfilled_branches(fn);
03101     }
03102 
03103     for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
03104     {
03105         /* Delete dependence graph */
03106         L_delete_dependence_graph(cb);
03107 
03108         /* Delete MDES information */
03109         L_free_cb_mdes_info (cb);
03110     }
03111 
03112     if (L_spec_model == MCB)
03113     {
03114         Ldep_allow_upward_code_perc = MCB_old_upward;
03115         Ldep_allow_downward_code_perc = MCB_old_downward;
03116     }
03117 
03118     /*
03119      * Print out the schedule
03120      */
03121     if ( Lsched_print_statistics )
03122       {
03123         if (Lsched_do_postpass_scheduling || L_do_prepass_sched)
03124           {
03125             L_print_schedule(EXTERN_LOG_FILE, fn);
03126           }
03127         else
03128           {
03129             L_warn("You can not estimate the static execution frequency unless the code is scheduled!\n Disable print_statistics in Scheduler section!");
03130           }
03131       }
03132 
03133     Lsched_add_isl_attr(fn);
03134     /* Free up any memory allocated for the function */
03135     Lsched_func_complete(fn);
03136 }
Generated on Sat Aug 30 17:59:02 2014 for libsched by  1.4.7
